  2470 0000127C 00                      		db 0
  2471                                  
  2472                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2473                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  2474                                  ;***************************************************************************
  2475                                  
  2476                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  2477                                  
  2478                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  2479                                  ;
  2480                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  2481                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  2482                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  2483                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  2484                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  2485                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  2486                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  2487                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  2488                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  2489                                  ;
  2490                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  2491                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  2492                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  2493                                  ;
  2494                                  ;	uses:	
  2495                                  ;
  2496                                  ;
  2497                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  2498                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  2499                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  2500                                  ;
  2501                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  2502                                  
  2503                                  ; 16/10/2022
  2504                                  ; 28/05/2019
  2505                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  2506                                  
  2507                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  2508                                  
  2509                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  2510                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  2511                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  2512                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  2513                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  2514                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  2515                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  2516                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  2517                                  
  2518                                  ; 01/10/2022
  2519                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  2520                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  2521                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  2522                                  
  2523                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  2524 0000127D 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  2525 00001280 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  2526 00001282 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  2527 00001285 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  2528 00001287 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  2529 0000128A 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  2530                                  atd1:
  2531 0000128C 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  2532                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  2533                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2534                                  
  2535                                  atd2:					
  2536 00001291 53                      		push	bx
  2537 00001292 51                      		push	cx
  2538 00001293 52                      		push	dx
  2539 00001294 57                      		push	di
  2540 00001295 1E                      		push	ds
  2541 00001296 06                      		push	es
  2542 00001297 50                      		push	ax
  2543 00001298 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  2544                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  2545 0000129B 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  2546                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2547 0000129D C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  2548                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  2549                                  					; initially no error code.
  2550 000012A2 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  2551 000012A5 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  2552                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  2553 000012A9 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  2554                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  2555 000012AB C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  2556 000012B0 EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  2557                                  					; return
  2558                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2559                                  
  2560                                  atd3:					
  2561 000012B2 53                      		push	bx
  2562 000012B3 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  2563 000012B5 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  2564 000012B8 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  2565 000012BA 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  2566 000012BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  2567 000012BD 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  2568 000012C0 0E                      		push	cs
  2569 000012C1 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  2570 000012C4 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  2571 000012C6 58                      		pop	ax
  2572 000012C7 50                      		push	ax
  2573 000012C8 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  2574 000012CB BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  2575 000012CE EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  2576 000012CF E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  2577                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2578                                  
  2579                                  atd4:	
  2580                                  
  2581                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  2582                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  2583                                  				
  2584 000012D2 58                      		pop	ax
  2585                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  2586 000012D3 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  2587 000012D7 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  2588 000012D9 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  2589 000012DB F9                      		stc
  2590                                  atd5:					
  2591 000012DC 07                      		pop	es
  2592 000012DD 1F                      		pop	ds
  2593 000012DE 5F                      		pop	di
  2594 000012DF 5A                      		pop	dx
  2595 000012E0 59                      		pop	cx
  2596 000012E1 5B                      		pop	bx
  2597 000012E2 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  2598                                  
  2599                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2600                                  
  2601                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  2602                                  ;
  2603                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  2604                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  2605                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  2606                                  ;	
  2607                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  2608                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  2609                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  2610                                  ;
  2611                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  2612                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  2613                                  ;
  2614                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  2615                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  2616                                  
  2617                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  2618                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  2619                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2620 000012E5 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  2621                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  2622 000012E8 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  2623 000012ED 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  2624 000012F0 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  2625 000012F2 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  2626                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  2627                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  2628                                  setc1:					
  2629 000012F7 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  2630 000012F9 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  2631                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  2632                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  2633 000012FB A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  2634 000012FE 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  2635 00001302 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  2636 00001304 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  2637                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  2638 00001307 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  2639 0000130A 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  2640 0000130C C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  2641 0000130F 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  2642 00001312 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  2643 00001314 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  2644                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  2645 00001316 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  2646 00001319 06                      		push	es
  2647 0000131A 53                      		push	bx
  2648 0000131B 0E                      		push	cs
  2649 0000131C E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  2650 0000131F 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  2651                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  2652 00001323 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  2653                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  2654 00001326 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  2655                                  					; only use low part
  2656 00001329 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  2657                                  					; control byte modifier
  2658 0000132D 5B                      		pop	bx
  2659 0000132E 07                      		pop	es
  2660                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  2661 0000132F 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  2662 00001333 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  2663 00001336 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  2664                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  2665 00001338 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  2666 0000133C C3                      		retn
  2667                                  
  2668                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2669                                  
  2670                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  2671                                  ;
  2672                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  2673                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  2674                                  ;
  2675                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  2676                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  2677                                  ;
  2678                                  ;	
  2679                                  ;
  2680                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  2681                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  2682                                  ;
  2683                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  2684                                  ;		performs disk input.
  2685                                  
  2686                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  2687 0000133D 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  2688 0000133F 0E                      		push	cs
  2689 00001340 E84000                  		call	command
  2690 00001343 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  2691                                  doc1:					
  2692 00001345 0E                      		push	cs
  2693 00001346 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  2694 00001349 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  2695 0000134B B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  2696 0000134E BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  2697 00001351 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  2698 00001352 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  2699                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  2700                                  
  2701                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  2702                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  2703                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  2704                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  2705                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  2706                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  2707                                  ;
  2708                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  2709                                  
  2710                                  rsct_loop:				
  2711 00001353 6D                      		insw
  2712 00001354 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  2713 00001356 FB                      		sti
  2714                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2715 00001357 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  2716                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  2717                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  2718 0000135C 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  2719 0000135E 0E                      		push	cs
  2720 0000135F E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  2721 00001362 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  2722 00001364 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  2723 00001367 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  2724 0000136A FA                      		cli
  2725 0000136B F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  2726 0000136D FB                      		sti
  2727                                  doc2:					
  2728 0000136E 0E                      		push	cs
  2729 0000136F E82900                  		call	check_status
  2730 00001372 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  2731                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  2732 00001374 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  2733 00001378 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  2734                                  doc3:					
  2735 0000137A C3                      		retn
  2736                                  
  2737                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2738                                  
  2739                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  2740                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  2741                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  2742                                  
  2743                                  ; 16/10/2022
  2744                                  
  2745                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  2746                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  2747                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  2748                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  2749                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  2750                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  2751                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  2752                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  2753                                  
  2754                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  2755                                  ;
  2756                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  2757                                  ;
  2758                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  2759                                  ;
  2760                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  2761                                  ;
  2762                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  2763                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  2764                                  ;	
  2765                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  2766                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  2767                                  
  2768                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  2769                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  2770                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  2771                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2772 0000137B 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  2773 0000137E EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  2774                                  
  2775                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2776                                  
  2777                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  2778                                  ;
  2779                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  2780                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  2781                                  ;
  2782                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  2783                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  2784                                  ;
  2785                                  ;
  2786                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  2787                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  2788                                  ;
  2789                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  2790                                  
  2791                                  command:	; proc near		
  2792                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  2793                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  2794                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2795 00001383 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  2796 00001386 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  2797                                  
  2798                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2799                                  
  2800                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  2801                                  ;
  2802                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  2803                                  ;
  2804                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  2805                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  2806                                  ;
  2807                                  ;
  2808                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  2809                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  2810                                  ;		
  2811                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  2812                                  
  2813                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  2814                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  2815                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  2816                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2817 0000138B 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  2818 0000138E EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  2819                                  
  2820                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2821                                  
  2822                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  2823                                  ;
  2824                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  2825                                  ;
  2826                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  2827                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  2828                                  ;
  2829                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  2830                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  2831                                  
  2832                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  2833                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  2834                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  2835                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2836 00001393 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  2837 00001396 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  2838                                  
  2839                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2840                                  
  2841                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  2842                                  ;
  2843                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  2844                                  ;
  2845                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  2846                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  2847                                  ;
  2848                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  2849                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  2850                                  
  2851                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  2852                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  2853                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  2854                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2855 0000139B 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  2856 0000139E EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  2857                                  
  2858                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2859                                  
  2860                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  2861                                  ;
  2862                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  2863                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  2864                                  ;
  2865                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  2866                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  2867                                  ;
  2868                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  2869                                  
  2870                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  2871                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  2872                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  2873                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2874 000013A3 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  2875 000013A6 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  2876                                  
  2877                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2878                                  
  2879                                  endatrom:
  2880                                  
  2881                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2882                                  
  2883                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  2884                                  ;;
  2885                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  2886                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  2887                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  2888                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  2889                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  2890                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  2891                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  2892                                  
  2893                                  compaq_disk_io:
  2894 000013AB 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  2895                                  					;
  2896                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  2897                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  2898                                  					;
  2899                                  					; warning!!!
  2900                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  2901 000013AE 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  2902                                  no_hookit:				
  2903                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  2904                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2905 000013B0 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  2906                                  
  2907                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2908                                  
  2909                                  mebbe_hookit:
  2910 000013B5 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  2911 000013B8 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  2912 000013BA 1E                      		push	ds
  2913                                  		
  2914                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  2915                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1830h
  2916                                  		;push	ax
  2917                                  		;mov	ax, 40h
  2918                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  2919                                  		;pop	ax
  2920 000013BB 6A40                    		push	40h
  2921 000013BD 1F                      		pop	ds
  2922                                  
  2923 000013BE 9C                      		pushf
  2924                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  2925                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2926 000013BF 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  2927 000013C4 1F                      		pop	ds
  2928 000013C5 CA0200                  		retf	2
  2929                                  
  2930                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2931                                  
  2932 000013C8 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  2933                                  
  2934                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2935                                  
  2936                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  2937                                  %if 0  
  2938                                  
  2939                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  2940                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  2941                                  
  2942                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  2943                                  
  2944                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  2945                                  ;
  2946                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  2947                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  2948                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  2949                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  2950                                  
  2951                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  2952                                  		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  2953                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  2954                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  2955                                  		jnb	short century20
  2956                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  2957                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  2958                                  		jmp	short years
  2959                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2960                                  		
  2961                                  century20:				
  2962                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  2963                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  2964                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  2965                                  					; adjust daycnt
  2966                                  years:					
  2967                                  		xor	dx, dx
  2968                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  2969                                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  2970                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  2971                                  		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  2972                                  		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  2973                                  		mov	bl, 4
  2974                                  		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  2975                                  		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  2976                                  		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  2977                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  2978                                  		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  2979                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  2980                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  2981                                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  2982                                  regularyear:				
  2983                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  2984                                  		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  2985                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  2986                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  2987                                  		loop	regularyear	; }
  2988                                  					;
  2989                                  					; should never fall through loop
  2990                                  leapyear:				
  2991                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  2992                                  					; change month table.
  2993                                  yeardone:				
  2994                                  		xor	bx, bx
  2995                                  		xor	dx, dx
  2996                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  2997                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  2998                                  		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  2999                                  		mov	cx, 12
  3000                                  months:					
  3001                                  		inc	bl
  3002                                  
  3003                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3004                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3005                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3006                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3007                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3008                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3009                                  		
  3010                                  		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3011                                  		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3012                                  					; dh=0
  3013                                  		jbe	short month_done
  3014                                  		inc	si		; next month
  3015                                  		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3016                                  		loop	months		;
  3017                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3018                                  month_done:				
  3019                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3020                                  					; restore month table value
  3021                                  		mov	dl, bl
  3022                                  		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3023                                  		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3024                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3025                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3026                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3027                                  		xchg	dl, al
  3028                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3029                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3030                                  		xchg	dh, al
  3031                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3032                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3033                                  		xchg	cl, al
  3034                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3035                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3036                                  		mov	ch, al
  3037                                  		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3038                                  		retf
  3039                                  
  3040                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3041                                  
  3042                                  %endif
  3043                                  
  3044                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3045                                  
  3046                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3047                                  %if 0  
  3048                                  
  3049                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3050                                  
  3051                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3052                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3053                                  		
  3054                                  		push	cx		
  3055                                  		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bcd
  3056                                  		mov	cl, 4
  3057                                  		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3058                                  		or	al, ah
  3059                                  		pop	cx
  3060                                  		retf
  3061                                  %endif
  3062                                  
  3063                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3064                                  
  3065                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3066                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3067                                  
  3068                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3069                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3070                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3071                                  
  3072                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3073                                  
  3074                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3075                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:183Eh
  3076                                  int_6Ch:
  3077 000013C9 0E                      		push	cs
  3078 000013CA 1F                      		pop	ds
  3079                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0  
  3080 000013CB 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0
  3081 000013D0 7405                    		jz      short int6c
  3082 000013D2 BB[9007]                		mov     bx, EnsureA20On
  3083 000013D5 FFD3                    		call    bx
  3084                                  int6c:					
  3085                                  		;push	cs
  3086                                  		;pop	ds
  3087 000013D7 8F06[B306]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3088 000013DB 8F06[B506]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3089 000013DF 9D                      		popf

  3107                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  3108                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si

  3110                                  read_real_date:	; proc near

  3112 000013F7 51                      		push	cx
  3113 000013F8 52                      		push	dx
  3114 000013F9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  3115 000013FB CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  3116                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  3117                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  3118                                  					; midnight

  3252                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  3253                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  3254                                  
  3255                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  3256 000014A5 B402                    		mov	ah, 2

  3258                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  3259                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD

  3287                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  3288                                  
  3289                                  in_bin:		; proc near

  3291 000014E1 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin

  3293 000014E7 A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes

  3296 000014F0 A0[B906]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds

  3300 000014FC E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin

  3302 00001502 C3                      		retn
  3303                                  
  3304                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  3305                                  
  3306                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  3307                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  3308                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  3309                                  
  3310                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near
  3311 00001503 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  3312 00001505 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  3313 00001507 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  3314 00001509 D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  3315 0000150B D50A                    		aad
  3316 0000150D C3                      		retn
  3317                                  
  3318                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3319                                  
  3320                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  3321                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  3322                                  
  3323                                  date_verify:	; proc near
  3324 0000150E 803E[B706]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  3325 00001513 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  3326 00001515 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  3327 00001517 803E[B706]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  3328                                  		;jb	short date_error
  3329                                  		; 12/12/2022

  3389                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3390                                  
  3391                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  3392                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  3393                                  
  3394                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near
  3395 0000155E B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  3396 00001561 BB[B706]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  3397                                  bv_loop:
  3398 00001564 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  3399 00001566 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  3400 00001568 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  3401                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  3402 0000156B 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  3403 0000156D 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  3404 0000156F D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  3405 00001571 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  3406 00001573 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  3407 00001575 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  3408 00001577 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  3409 0000157A 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  3410 0000157D 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  3411 0000157F 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  3412 00001580 49                      		dec	cx
  3413 00001581 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  3414 00001583 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  3415 00001584 C3                      		retn

  3429                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3430                                  ;									:
  3431                                  ;	System initialization						:
  3432                                  ;									:
  3433                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  3434                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  3435                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  3436                                  ;									:
  3437                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  3438                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  3439                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  3440                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  3441                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  3442                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  3443                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  3444                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  3445                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  3446                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  3447                                  ;		this program.						:
  3448                                  ;									:
  3449                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3450                                  
  3451                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3452                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  3453                                  
  3454                                  ; drvfat must be the first location of freeable space!
  3455                                  
  3456 00001585 90                      align 2
  3457                                  		;db 90h
  3458                                  
  3459                                  ; 20/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 combined/single kernel file)
  3460                                  ; ((no need to read/load 'MSDOS.SYS', it is already loaded))
  3461                                  ; (((bios_l,bios_h,doscnt,fatloc,md_sectorsize,temp_cluster,last_fat_sec_num
  3462                                  ;   would be used to read 'MSDOS.SYS' from disk, now they are not needed)))
  3463                                  	
  3464 00001586 0000                    drvfat:		dw 0			; drive	and fat	id of dos
  3465                                  ;bios_l:	dw 0			; first	sector of data (low word)
  3466                                  ;bios_h:	dw 0			; first	sector of data (high word)
  3467                                  ;doscnt:	dw 0			; how many sectors to read
  3468 00001588 00                      fbigfat:	db 0			; flags	for drive
  3469                                  ;fatloc:	dw 0			; seg addr of fat sector
  3470 00001589 0000                    init_bootseg:	dw 0			; seg addr of buffer for reading boot record
  3471 0000158B 80                      rom_drv_num:	db 80h			; rom drive number
  3472                                  ;md_sectorsize:	dw 200h			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  3473                                  ;temp_cluster:	dw 0			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  3474                                  ;last_fat_sec_num: dw 0FFFFh		; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  3475                                  
  3476                                  ; the following two bytes are used to save the info returned by int 13, ah = 8
  3477                                  ; call to determine drive parameters.
  3478                                  
  3479 0000158C 02                      num_heads:	db 2			; number of heads returned by rom
  3480                                  		;db 0	; 08/08/2023
  3481 0000158D 09                      sec_trk:	db 9			; sec/trk returned by rom
  3482 0000158E 28                      num_cyln:	db 40			; number of cylinders returned by rom
  3483                                  		;db 0	; 08/08/2023
  3484 0000158F 00                      fakefloppydrv:	db 0			; if 1,	then no	diskette drives	in the system.
  3485                                  
  3486                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3487                                  
  3488 00001590 0002000140000000        disktable:	dw 512,	0100h, 64, 0	; warning !!! old values
  3489 00001598 0008010270000000        		dw 2048, 0201h, 112, 0
  3490 000015A0 0020020400010000        		dw 8192, 0402h, 256, 0
  3491 000015A8 A87F030800020000        		dw 32680, 0803h, 512, 0	; warning !!! old values

  3582                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)

  3711                                  ;	entry point to call utility functions in Bios_Code. At this time,
  3712                                  ;	  we aren't doing any A20 switching. During MSINIT time Bios_Code
  3713                                  ;	  will not yet be moved to its final resting place, so we know
  3714                                  ;	  it'll be low.
  3715                                  ;
  3716                                  ;	to use this function, do a "push cs" and load bp with the offset of
  3717                                  ;	  the function you want to call in Bios_Code. This routine will
  3718                                  ;	  push the address of a retf in Bios_Code onto the stack which
  3719                                  ;	  will get executed when the utility function finishes. It will
  3720                                  ;	  then transfer control to Bios_Code:bp using a couple of pushes
  3721                                  ;	  and a retf
  3722                                  
  3723                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3724                                  ;BC_RETF equ bc_retf - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  3725                                  ; 09/12/2022
  3726                                  BC_RETF equ bc_retf
  3727                                  
  3728                                  addr_of_bcretf:	;dw 0C8h		; dw bc_retf
  3729                                  					; 2C7h:0C8h = 70h:2638h
  3730 00001611 [CA00]                  		dw BC_RETF
  3731                                  
  3732                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3733                                  
  3734                                  call_bios_code:	; proc far			
  3735 00001613 2EFF36[1116]            		push	word [cs:addr_of_bcretf] 
  3736                                  					; set up near return to far return
  3737 00001618 2EFF36[BF06]            		push	word [cs:cdev+2] ; push Bios_Code segment
  3738 0000161D 55                      		push	bp		; save offset of utility function
  3739 0000161E CB                      		retf			; far jump to (DOS)BIOS code
  3740

  3748                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0, classic/old MICROSOFT DOS method)
  3749                                  ; 20/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (combined kernel files, original/new method) (*)
  3750                                  ;      (*) (for using Retro DOS kernel 'MSDOS.SYS' with Retro DOS boot sector)

  3756                                  init:		; 27/12/2018
  3757                                  		; MSDOS 6.0 (MSINIT.ASM)
  3758                                  		;=============================================================
  3759                                  		;
  3760                                  		; entry from boot sector. the register contents are:
  3761                                  		;
  3762                                  		;   dl = int 13 drive number we booted from
  3763                                  		;   ch = media byte
  3764                                  		;   bx = first data sector on disk.
  3765                                  		;   ax = first data sector (high)
  3766                                  		;   di = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  3767                                  
  3768                                  		; 07/04/2018
  3769                                  		;=============================================================
  3770                                  		; Retro DOS v2.0 - registers from FD Boot Sector 
  3771                                                  ; DL = [bsDriveNumber]
  3772                                  		; DH = [bsMedia]
  3773                                  		; AX = [bsSectors] ; Total sectors
  3774                                  		; DS = 0, SS = 0
  3775                                  		; BP = 7C00h
  3776                                  
  3777                                  		; 29/09/2023
  3778                                  		; SP = 0FFFEh (for Retro DOS v2&v3 boot sector) 
  3779                                  		;    = 07C00h (for MSDOS 5.0 boot sector)
  3780                                  		
  3781                                  ; 20/12/2022
  3782                                  ; Changing original MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS init code with Retro DOS v4.0 init code.		
  3783                                  %if 0	
  3784                                  		cli
  3785                                  
  3786                                  		push	ax
  3787                                  		xor	ax, ax
  3788                                  		mov	ds, ax
  3789                                  		pop	ax
  3790                                  %endif
  3791                                  
  3792                                  ; 20/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (combined kernel)
  3793                                  
  3794                                  KERNEL_SEGMENT equ 70h	; (DOS BIOSDATA SEGMENT)
  3795                                  BSSECPERTRACK equ 18h	; boot sector offset 18h (for Retro DOS & MSDOS)	
  3796

  3916 0000165A 894F02                  		mov	[bx+2], cx ; 0  ; [007Ah] ; 1Eh*4+2 ; segment
