  6764                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6765                                  		SYSINIT_OFFSET equ (SYSINITSEG-DOSBIODATASEG<<4)
  6766                                  							; correct offset
  6767 00001F3C 8BB7[AC85]              		mov	si, [bx+SYSINIT_OFFSET+bpbtable]
  6768                                  
  6769                                  		; 28/08/2023
  6770 00001F40 81C6D03B                		add	si, SYSINIT_OFFSET
  6771                                  set_recbpb:				
  6772 00001F44 8D7D27                  		lea	di, [di+27h]	; [di+BDS.R_BPB]
  6773                                  					; es:di -> recbpb
  6774 00001F47 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; bpbx.size
  6775 00001F4A F3A4                    		rep movsb		; move (size bpbx) bytes
  6776                                  go_to_next_bds:				
  6777 00001F4C 5F                      		pop	di
  6778 00001F4D 07                      		pop	es		; restore pointer to bds
  6779 00001F4E 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  6780 00001F51 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; -1
  6781 00001F54 740A                    		jz	short got_end_of_bds_chain
  6782 00001F56 E94DFF                  		jmp	_next_bds
  6783                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6784                                  
  6785                                  		; 18/12/2022
  6786                                  ;got_end_of_bds_chain:			
  6787                                  		;retn
  6788                                  
  6789                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6790                                  
  6791                                  ; 15/10/2022
  6792                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  6793                                  
  6794                                  ; al = device number
  6795                                  
  6796                                  print_init:	
  6797 00001F59 98                      		cbw
  6798 00001F5A 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  6799 00001F5C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  6800 00001F5E CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - INITIALIZE
  6801                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  6802                                  					; Return: AH = status
  6803                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022
  6804 00001F60 C3                      		retn
  6805

  6807

  6813                                  		;mov	al, 0A3h	; RSINIT ; 0A3h
  6814                                  					; 2400,n,1,8 (msequ.inc)
  6815                                  		;mov	ah, 0
  6816                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6817 00001F64 B8A300                  		mov	ax, 00A3h
  6818 00001F67 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - INITIALIZE USART
  6819                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
  6820                                  					;	DX = port number (0-3)
  6821                                  					; Return: AH = RS-232 status code bits,
  6822                                  					;	  AL = modem status bits
  6823 00001F69 C3                      		retn

  6826                                  
  6827                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  6828                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  6829                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  6830                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  6831                                  
  6832                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  6833                                  ;
  6834                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  6835                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  6836                                  ;
  6837                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  6838                                  ;
  6839                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  6840                                  ;   initialize it.
  6841                                  ;
  6842                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  6843                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  6844                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  6845                                  ;
  6846                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  6847                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  6848                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  6849                                  ;
  6850                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  6851                                  ;   save coding.
  6852                                  ;
  6853                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  6854                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  6855                                  ;
  6856                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  6857                                  ;
  6858                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  6859                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  6860                                  ;
  6861                                  ; called modules:
  6862                                  ;		  getboot
  6863                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  6864                                  ;
  6865                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  6866                                  ;
  6867                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  6868                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  6869                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  6870                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  6871                                  ;
  6872                                  ;******************************************************************************
  6873                                  
  6874                                  		; 19/10/2022
  6875                                  domini:	
  6876 00001F6A 8A36[FF15]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  6877                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6878 00001F6E 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  6879                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  6880 00001F70 7430                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  6881 00001F72 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  6882                                  domini_loop:				
  6883 00001F74 52                      		push	dx
  6884 00001F75 8816[FE15]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  6885 00001F79 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  6886 00001F7B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  6887                                  					; DL = drive number
  6888                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  6889                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  6890                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  6891                                  		
  6892                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  6893                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  6894                                  		;inc	dh
  6895                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  6896                                  		;mov	al, dh
  6897 00001F7D 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  6898 00001F7F 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  6899 00001F81 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  6900 00001F82 A3[0416]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  6901                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  6902                                  		;mov	al, cl
  6903                                  		; 08/08/2023
  6904 00001F85 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  6905 00001F87 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  6906 00001F8A A3[0616]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  6907 00001F8D 06                      		push	es
  6908 00001F8E 8A16[FE15]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  6909 00001F92 E882FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  6910                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  6911 00001F95 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  6912 00001F97 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  6913                                  domininext:				
  6914 00001F9A 07                      		pop	es
  6915 00001F9B 5A                      		pop	dx
  6916 00001F9C FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  6917 00001F9E FECE                    		dec	dh
  6918 00001FA0 75D2                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  6919                                  dominiret:				
  6920 00001FA2 C3                      		retn
  6921                                  
  6922                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6923                                  
  6924                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  6925                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  6926                                  
  6927                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  6928                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  6929                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  6930                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  6931                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  6932                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  6933                                  ;
  6934                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  6935                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  6936                                  
  6937                                  find_mini_partition:	
  6938 00001FA3 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  6939                                  fmpnext:				
  6940 00001FA7 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  6941 00001FAB 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  6942 00001FAD 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  6943 00001FB0 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  6944 00001FB4 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  6945                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  6946                                  		; 18/12/2022
  6947                                  fmpnextfound:
  6948 00001FB6 C3                      		retn
  6949                                  
  6950                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  6951                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  6952                                  ;fmpret:
  6953                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  6954                                  
  6955                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6956                                  
  6957                                  		; 19/10/2022
  6958                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  6959 00001FB7 E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  6960 00001FBA 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  6961 00001FBC 8B3E[0216]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free bds
  6962 00001FC0 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  6963                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6964 00001FC5 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  6965                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  6966                                  					; fNon_Removable
  6967 00001FC9 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  6968                                  					; ffHardFile
  6969 00001FCD C606[8815]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  6970 00001FD2 A1[0416]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  6971 00001FD5 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  6972 00001FD8 A1[0616]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  6973 00001FDB 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6974 00001FDE A0[FE15]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  6975 00001FE1 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  6976                                  					; set physical number
  6977 00001FE4 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  6978 00001FE7 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  6979                                  					; set logical number
  6980 00001FEA 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  6981 00001FEF 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  6982 00001FF1 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  6983                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  6984 00001FF6 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  6985                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  6986                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  6987 00001FF8 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  6988 00001FFB 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  6989 00001FFF 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  6990 00002002 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  6991 00002004 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  6992 00002006 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  6993 0000200A 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  6994                                  					; set hidden trks
  6995 0000200D 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  6996 00002011 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  6997 00002015 8A16[FE15]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  6998 00002019 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  6999 0000201C B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7000 0000201F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7001                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7002                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7003                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7004 00002021 7293                    		jc	short fmpnextfound
  7005 00002023 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7006                                  
  7007                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7008                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7009 00002026 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7010 0000202C 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7011                                  
  7012                                  		; 13/08/2023
  7013                                  		;push	es
  7014 0000202E E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7015                                  					; bx value saved.
  7016                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7017 00002031 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7018 00002033 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7019                                  fmpnextchain:
  7020 00002036 E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7021                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7022                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7023                                  
  7024                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7025                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7026                                  		;retn
  7027                                  
  7028                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7029                                  
  7030                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7031                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7032                                  
  7033                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7034                                  	
  7035 00002039 57                      		push	di
  7036 0000203A 53                      		push	bx
  7037                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7038                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7039                                  		;push	ds
  7040 0000203B 06                      		push	es
  7041                                  setmini_1:				
  7042 0000203C 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7043 00002040 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7044 00002042 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7045 00002046 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7046 00002048 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7047 0000204C 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7048 0000204E 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7049 00002051 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7050 00002055 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7051 00002057 F9                      		stc
  7052 00002058 07                      		pop	es
  7053                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7054                                  		;pop	ds
  7055 00002059 5B                      		pop	bx
  7056 0000205A 5F                      		pop	di
  7057 0000205B C3                      		retn
  7058                                  
  7059                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7060                                  setmini_2:
  7061 0000205C E964FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7062                                  
  7063                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7064                                  
  7065                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7066                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7067                                  ;
  7068                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7069                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7070                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7071                                  ;
  7072                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7073                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7074                                  ;			trash ax
  7075                                  
  7076                                  dmax_check:
  7077 0000205F 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7078 00002064 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; returns with carry if okay
  7079 00002066 06                      		push	es
  7080                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7081 00002067 B82D04                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7082 0000206A 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7083                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7084 0000206C 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7085                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7086                                  					; set message flag
  7087                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7088 00002072 07                      		pop	es
  7089                                  
  7090                                  		;;push	es
  7091                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7092                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7093                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7094                                  					; set message flag
  7095                                  		;;pop	es
  7096                                  		;
  7097                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7098                                  dmax_ok:
  7099 00002073 C3                      		retn
  7100                                  
  7101                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7102                                  
  7103                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7104                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7105                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7106                                  ;								 
  7107                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7108                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7109                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7110                                  
  7111                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7112 00002074 56                      		push	si
  7113 00002075 53                      		push	bx
  7114 00002076 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7115                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7116 0000207A 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7117 0000207D 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ; skip ahead if so
  7118                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7119 0000207F 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7120 00002081 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7121                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7122                                  
  7123                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7124                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7125 00002083 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7126                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7127 00002085 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7128                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7129 00002088 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7130                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7131 0000208C 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7132                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7133                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7134 0000208F 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7135 00002092 8B36[0016]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7136 00002096 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7137 00002098 8306[0016]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7138 0000209D FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7139 000020A1 8306[0216]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7140 000020A6 5B                      		pop	bx
  7141 000020A7 5E                      		pop	si
  7142 000020A8 C3                      		retn
  7143                                  
  7144                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7145                                  
  7146                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7147                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7148                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7149                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7150                                  
  7151                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7152 000020A9 50                      		push	ax
  7153 000020AA 51                      		push	cx
  7154 000020AB 52                      		push	dx
  7155 000020AC 55                      		push	bp
  7156 000020AD 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7157                                  loop_clock:				
  7158 000020AF 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7159 000020B1 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7160 000020B3 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7161 000020B5 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7162                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7163                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7164                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7165 000020B7 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7166 000020BA 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7167 000020BC 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7168 000020BF 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7169 000020C1 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7170 000020C4 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was at zero setting.
  7171 000020C6 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7172 000020C7 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7173                                  delay:					
  7174 000020CA E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7175 000020CC EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7176                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7177                                  
  7178                                  clock_present:				
  7179 000020CE 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7180 000020D4 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7181                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7182                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7183 000020D7 56                      		push	si
  7184 000020D8 E81BF3                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7185 000020DB FA                      		cli
  7186                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7187 000020DC 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7188 000020E0 FB                      		sti
  7189 000020E1 5E                      		pop	si
  7190                                  
  7191                                  no_readdate:				
  7192 000020E2 5D                      		pop	bp
  7193 000020E3 5A                      		pop	dx
  7194 000020E4 59                      		pop	cx
  7195 000020E5 58                      		pop	ax
  7196 000020E6 C3                      		retn
  7197                                  
  7198                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7199                                  
  7200                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7201                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7202                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7203                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7204                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7205                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7206                                  ;
  7207                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7208                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7209                                  ;
  7210                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7211                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7212                                  ;
  7213                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7214                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7215                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7216                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7217                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7218                                  ;
  7219                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7220                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7221                                  
  7222                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits
  7223                                  
  7224                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7225                                  
  7226                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7227                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7228                                  			
  7229 000020E7 50                      		push	ax
  7230 000020E8 2E803E[3606]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7231 000020EE 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7232 000020F0 2E803E[3706]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7233                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7234 000020F6 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS periodic rate if 06
  7235 000020F8 2E803E[3706]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7236                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7237 000020FE 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST
  7238                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0
  7239                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7240                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE
  7241                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06
  7242                                  cmosck4:				
  7243 00002100 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7244                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7245 00002102 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7246                                  					; Set divider & rate selection
  7247 00002104 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7248 00002107 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7249                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7250 00002109 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7251 0000210C 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7252                                  					; clear SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7253 0000210E 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7254 00002110 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7255                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7256 00002112 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7257                                  cmosck9:				
  7258 00002115 58                      		pop	ax
  7259 00002116 C3                      		retn
  7260                                  
  7261                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7262                                  
  7263                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7264                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7265                                  ;									       :
  7266                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7267                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7268                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7269                                  ;									       :
  7270                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7271                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7272                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7273                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7274                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7275                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7276                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7277                                  
  7278                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7279 00002117 9C                      		pushf
  7280 00002118 FA                      		cli
  7281 00002119 53                      		push	bx
  7282 0000211A 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be read
  7283 0000211B 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7284 0000211D E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7285                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7286 0000211F 90                      		nop			; (undocumented delay needed)
  7287 00002120 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7288 00002122 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7289 00002124 58                      		pop	ax
  7290 00002125 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7291 00002127 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7292 00002129 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7293                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7294 0000212B 90                      		nop
  7295 0000212C E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7296 0000212E 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7297 00002130 5B                      		pop	bx
  7298 00002131 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7299 00002132 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7300 00002135 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7301                                  
  7302                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7303                                  
  7304                                  cmos_popf:				
  7305 00002136 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7306                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7307                                  
  7308                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7309                                  
  7310                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7311                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7312                                  ;									       :
  7313                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7314                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7315                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7316                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7317                                  ;									       :
  7318                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7319                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7320                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7321                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7322                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7323                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7324                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7325                                  
  7326                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)
  7327 00002137 9C                      		pushf			;
  7328 00002138 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7329 00002139 FA                      		cli
  7330 0000213A 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7331 0000213B 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7332 0000213D E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7333                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7334 0000213F 90                      		nop
  7335 00002140 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7336 00002142 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7337 00002144 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7338 00002145 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7339 00002147 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7340 00002149 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7341                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7342 0000214B 90                      		nop
  7343 0000214C E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7344 0000214E 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7345 0000214F 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7346 00002150 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7347 00002153 C3                      		retn
  7348                                  
  7349                                  ; 21/12/2022
  7350                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7351                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7352                                  %if 0
  7353                                  
  7354                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7355                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7356                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7357                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7358                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7359                                  
  7360                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7361                                  ;
  7362                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7363                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7364                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7365                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7366                                  
  7367                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7368                                  
  7369                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7370                                  ;
  7371                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7372                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7373                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7374                                  
  7375                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7376                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7377                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7378                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7379                                  
  7380                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7381                                  getclus:				
  7382                                  		push	cx
  7383                                  		push	di
  7384                                  		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7385                                  		mov	ax, bx
  7386                                  		dec	ax
  7387                                  		dec	ax
  7388                                  		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7389                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7390                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7391                                  		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7392                                  		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7393                                  unpack:					
  7394                                  		push	ds
  7395                                  		push	ax
  7396                                  		push	bx
  7397                                  		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7398                                  		mov	ds, si
  7399                                  		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7400                                  		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7401                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7402                                  		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7403                                  		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7404                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7405                                  		add	si, bx		;
  7406                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7407                                  		push	dx
  7408                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7409                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7410                                  		pop	dx
  7411                                  		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7412                                  		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7413                                  		; 25/06/2023	
  7414                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7415                                  		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7416                                  		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7417                                  		push	dx
  7418                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7419                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7420                                  		pop	dx
  7421                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7422                                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7423                                  		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7424                                  		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7425                                  even_odd:				
  7426                                  		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7427                                  		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7428                                  		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7429                                  		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7430                                  		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7431                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7432                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7433                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7434                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7435                                  havclus:				
  7436                                  		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7437                                  		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7438                                  		jmp	short unpackx
  7439                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7440                                  
  7441                                  unpack16:				
  7442                                  		push	dx
  7443                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7444                                  		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7445                                  		adc	dx, 0
  7446                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7447                                  		pop	dx
  7448                                  		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7449                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7450                                  unpackx:				
  7451                                  		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7452                                  		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7453                                  		pop	ds
  7454                                  		sub	si, bx
  7455                                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7456                                  		jnz	short getcl2
  7457                                  		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7458                                  		jmp	short unpack
  7459                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7460                                  
  7461                                  getcl2:					
  7462                                  		push	bx
  7463                                  		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7464                                  		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7465                                  		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7466                                  		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7467                                  		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7468                                  		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7469                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7470                                  		push	ds
  7471                                  		push	cs
  7472                                  		pop	ds
  7473                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7474                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7475                                  		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7476                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7477                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7478                                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7479                                  		pop	ds
  7480                                  		pop	bx
  7481                                  		pop	di
  7482                                  		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7483                                  		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7484                                  		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7485                                  		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7486                                  		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7487                                  		retn
  7488                                  
  7489                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7490                                  
  7491                                  
  7492                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7493                                  ;
  7494                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7495                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7496                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7497                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7498                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7499                                  ;
  7500                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7501                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7502                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7503                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7504                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7505                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7506                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7507                                  
  7508                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7509                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7510                                  		push	ax
  7511                                  		push	cx
  7512                                  		push	di
  7513                                  		push	si
  7514                                  		push	es
  7515                                  		push	ds
  7516                                  		mov	ax, si
  7517                                  		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7518                                  		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7519                                  		nop
  7520                                  
  7521                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7522                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7523                                  
  7524                                  		push	es
  7525                                  		push	ds
  7526                                  		push	di
  7527                                  		push	ax
  7528                                  		push	cs
  7529                                  		pop	ds
  7530                                  
  7531                                  		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7532                                  		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7533                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7534                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7535                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7536                                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7537                                  		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7538                                  		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7539                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7540                                  		pop	di
  7541                                  		pop	ds
  7542                                  		pop	es
  7543                                  		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7544                                  		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7545                                  		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7546                                  					; sector number
  7547                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7548                                  		push	dx
  7549                                  		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7550                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7551                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7552                                  		mov	dx, ax
  7553                                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7554                                  		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7555                                  		push	ds
  7556                                  		pop	es
  7557                                  		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7558                                  		push	ds
  7559                                  		push	cs
  7560                                  		pop	ds
  7561                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7562                                  		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7563                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7564                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7565                                  		call	call_bios_code
  7566                                  		pop	ds
  7567                                  		pop	dx
  7568                                  		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7569                                  
  7570                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7571                                  		dec	cx		; 511
  7572                                  		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7573                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7574                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7575                                  		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7576                                  		pop	ds
  7577                                  		pop	es
  7578                                  		pop	si
  7579                                  		pop	di
  7580                                  		pop	cx
  7581                                  		pop	ax
  7582                                  		retn
  7583                                  
  7584                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7585                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7586                                  
  7587                                  %endif
  7588                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7589                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  7592                                  		;db 0

  7595                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7596

  7598 00002154 00<rep Ch>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7599                                  %endif

  7608

  7610                                  S1SIZE equ $-$$

  7623                                  
  7624                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  7625                                  
  7626                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7627

  7629                                  
  7630                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7631                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7632                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7633                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7634                                  
  7635                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7636 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7637 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7638                                  
  7639                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7640                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7641                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7642                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7643                                  
  7644                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7645                                  
  7646                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7647                                  
  7648                                  ;************************************************************************
  7649                                  ;*									*
  7650                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7651                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7652                                  ;*									*
  7653                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7654                                  ;*									*
  7655                                  ;************************************************************************
  7656                                  
  7657                                  	; 20/09/2023	
  7658                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7659                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  7660                                  
  7661                                  _seg_reinit:
  7662 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7663                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7664                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7665 00000037 BF[BF06]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7666                                  		; 20/09/2023
  7667                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7668                                  		; 10/08/2023
  7669 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  7670                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  7671 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7672 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7673 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7674 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7675                                  
  7676                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  7677                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  7678                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  7679                                  		
  7680                                  		; 20/09/2023
  7681 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov	[es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  7682                                  		
  7683 00000046 CB                      		retf
  7684                                  
  7685                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7686                                  
  7687                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7688                                  
  7689                                  ;************************************************************************
  7690                                  ;*									*
  7691                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7692                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7693                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7694                                  ;*									*
  7695                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7696                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7697                                  ;*									*
  7698                                  ;************************************************************************
  7699                                  
  7700                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7701 00000047 56                      		push	si
  7702 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  7703 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  7704 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  7705 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  7706 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  7707 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  7708 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  7709 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  7710 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7711 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7712                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7713                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7714 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7715                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
  7716 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
  7717                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7718 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  7719 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7720 00000061 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7721                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7722 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7723 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7724 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7725 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  7726 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  7727                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7728 00000079 81FE[3805]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  7729                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  7730                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  7731                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  7732 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7733                                  
  7734                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  7735                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  7736                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  7737                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  7738                                  ;
  7739                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  7740                                  ;
  7741                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  7742                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  7743                                  ;	  it has been used.
  7744                                  ;
  7745                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  7746                                  
  7747                                  		; 20/09/2023
  7748                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  7749 0000007F C706[2305]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  7750 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  7751 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7752 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  7753                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  7754                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  7755 0000008E 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  7756 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  7757                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  7758                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  7759 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7760 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  7761 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
  7762 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
  7763 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  7764 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  7765 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  7766 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7767 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  7768 000000AA FC                      		cld
  7769                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7770 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  7771                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  7772 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  7773 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7774                                  already_got_ah_status:
  7775                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
  7776                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7777                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  7778 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7779                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7780 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  7781 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  7782                                  					; mark operation complete
  7783 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
  7784 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
  7785 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
  7786 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
  7787 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
  7788 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
  7789 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
  7790 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
  7791 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
  7792                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  7793                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
  7794 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
  7795 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
  7796                                  
  7797                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  7798                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  7799                                  bc_retf:
  7800 000000CA CB                      		retf
  7801                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7802                                  
  7803                                  command_error:				
  7804 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
  7805 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  7806                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7807                                  ; 01/05/2019
  7808                                  
  7809                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7810                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  7811                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  7812                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  7813                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  7814                                  ; high.
  7815                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7816                                  
  7817                                  
  7818                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  7819                                  
  7820                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
  7821                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
  7822                                  		; 15/10/2022
  7823                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  7824                                  
  7825 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  7826                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  7827                                  		
  7828                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7829                                  
  7830                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  7831                                  
  7832                                  bc_cmderr:				
  7833 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7834                                  					; unknown command error
  7835                                  
  7836                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7837                                  
  7838                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  7839                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  7840                                  
  7841                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  7842                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  7843                                  
  7844                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  7845                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7846                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7847 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  7848 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  7849                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  7850 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  7851 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  7852 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  7853                                  
  7854                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7855
