  7861                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7862                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7863                                  
  7864                                  ; 30/04/2019
  7865                                  
  7866                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  7867                                  
  7868                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  7869                                  
  7870                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  7871                                  
  7872                                  ;************************************************************************
  7873                                  ;*									*
  7874                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  7875                                  ;*									*
  7876                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  7877                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  7878                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  7879                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  7880                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  7881                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  7882                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  7883                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  7884                                  ;*									*
  7885                                  ;************************************************************************
  7886                                  
  7887                                  
  7888                                  		; 20/09/2023
  7889                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
  7890                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7891 000000E3 00                      		db 0
  7892                                  
  7893                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7894 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  7895                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  7896 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  7897                                  					; 00 init
  7898 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  7899 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  7900 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7901                                  					; 03
  7902 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  7903                                  					; 04
  7904 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  7905                                  					; 05
  7906 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  7907 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  7908                                  					; 07
  7909 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  7910                                  					; 08
  7911 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  7912 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  7913                                  con_table_end:
  7914 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  7915                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  7916 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  7917 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7918 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7919 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  7920 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  7921                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  7922 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  7923                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  7924 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  7925 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  7926 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  7927 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  7928 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  7929 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  7930 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  7931 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  7932 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  7933 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  7934 0000011C [8902]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  7935 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  7936 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  7937 00000122 [B702]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  7938 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  7939 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  7940 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  7941 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  7942 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  7943 0000012E [EC02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  7944                                  prn_table_end:
  7945 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  7946                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  7947 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  7948 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7949 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7950 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  7951 00000139 [0703]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  7952 0000013B [2C03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  7953 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  7954 0000013F [6203]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  7955 00000141 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  7956 00000143 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  7957 00000145 [4C03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  7958                                  aux_table_end:
  7959 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  7960                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  7961 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  7962 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7963 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7964 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  7965 00000150 [CE04]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  7966 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  7967 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  7968 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  7969 00000158 [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  7970 0000015A [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  7971                                  tim_table_end:
  7972                                  
  7973                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7974                                  
  7975                                  ;************************************************************************
  7976                                  ;*									*
  7977                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  7978                                  ;*									*
  7979                                  ;************************************************************************
  7980                                  
  7981                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  7982                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  7983 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  7984                                  con_loop:				
  7985 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  7986 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  7987 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  7988                                  con_exit:				
  7989 00000164 F8                      		clc
  7990 00000165 C3                      		retn
  7991                                  
  7992                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7993                                  
  7994                                  ;************************************************************************
  7995                                  ;*									*
  7996                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  7997                                  ;*									*
  7998                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  7999                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8000                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8001                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8002                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8003                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8004                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8005                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8006                                  ;*									*
  8007                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8008                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8009                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8010                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8011                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8012                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8013                                  ;*									*
  8014                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8015                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8016                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8017                                  ;*									*
  8018                                  ;************************************************************************
  8019                                  
  8020                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8021                                  chrin:		
  8022 00000166 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8023 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8024 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8025 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8026 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8027 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8028 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8029 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8030 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8031 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8032 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8033 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8034                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8035                                  
  8036                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8037                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8038                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8039                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8040                                  ;      else
  8041                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8042                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8043                                  ;      endif
  8044                                  ;    endif
  8045                                  ;  endif
  8046                                  
  8047                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8048 00000183 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8049 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8050 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8051 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8052 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8053 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8054 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8055 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8056                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8057                                  
  8058                                  not_ext:				
  8059 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8060 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8061                                  alt_save:				
  8062 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8063                                  keyret:					
  8064 0000019E C3                      		retn
  8065                                  
  8066                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8067                                  
  8068                                  ;************************************************************************
  8069                                  ;*									*
  8070                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8071                                  ;*									*
  8072                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8073                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8074                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8075                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8076                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8077                                  ;*									*
  8078                                  ;************************************************************************
  8079                                  
  8080                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8081                                  con_rdnd:				
  8082 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8083 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8084 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8085 000001A6 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8086 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8087 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8088 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8089 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8090 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8091                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8092 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8093                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8094 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8095 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8096 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8097 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8098                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8099                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8100                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8101                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8102 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8103 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8104 000001CA C3                      		retn
  8105                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8106                                  
  8107                                  gotchr:					
  8108 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8109 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8110 000001CF 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8111 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8112 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8113                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8114                                  
  8115                                  notbrk:					
  8116 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8117 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8118 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8119 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8120                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8121                                  
  8122                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8123 000001E0 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8124 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8125 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8126 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8127 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8128 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8129 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8130                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8131                                  rdexit:					
  8132 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8133 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8134                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8135                                  bc_exvec:				
  8136 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8137                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8138 000001FB C3                      		retn
  8139                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8140                                  
  8141                                  ;************************************************************************
  8142                                  ;*									*
  8143                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8144                                  ;*									*
  8145                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8146                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8147                                  ;*									*
  8148                                  ;************************************************************************
  8149                                  
  8150                                  con_writ:
  8151                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8152 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8153                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8154                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8155                                  con_lp:					
  8156 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8157 00000201 47                      		inc	di
  8158 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8159                                  					; AL = character to display
  8160 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8161                                  cc_ret:					
  8162 00000206 F8                      		clc
  8163 00000207 C3                      		retn
  8164                                  
  8165                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8166                                  
  8167                                  ;************************************************************************
  8168                                  ;*									*
  8169                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8170                                  ;*									*
  8171                                  ;************************************************************************
  8172                                  
  8173                                  con_flush:
  8174 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8175                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8176 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8177 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8178                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8179                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8180                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8181 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8182 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8183 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8184                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8185 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8186                                  
  8187                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8188                                  
  8189                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8190                                  
  8191                                  ;************************************************************************
  8192                                  ;*									*
  8193                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8194                                  ;*									*
  8195                                  ;************************************************************************
  8196                                  
  8197                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8198                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8199                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8200                                  
  8201                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8202                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8203                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8204                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8205                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8206                                  ;
  8207                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8208                                  
  8209                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8210                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8211                                  
  8212                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8213                                  
  8214                                  ;************************************************************************
  8215                                  ;*									*
  8216                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8217                                  ;*									*
  8218                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8219                                  ;*									*
  8220                                  ;************************************************************************
  8221                                  
  8222                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8223 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8224                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8225                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8226                                  prn_done:
  8227 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8228 0000021D C3                      		retn
  8229                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8230                                  
  8231                                  ;************************************************************************
  8232                                  ;*									*
  8233                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8234                                  ;*									*
  8235                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8236                                  ;*									*
  8237                                  ;************************************************************************
  8238                                  
  8239                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8240                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8241 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8242                                  prn_loop:				
  8243 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8244                                  prn_out:				
  8245 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8246 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8247 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8248 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8249 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8250 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8251 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8252 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8253 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8254 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8255 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8256                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8257                                  
  8258                                  _prnwf:					
  8259 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8260 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8261                                  TestPrnError:				
  8262 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8263 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8264                                  pmessg:					
  8265 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8266                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8267                                  
  8268                                  prn_con:				
  8269 0000024B 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8270 0000024C E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8271                                  ;prn_done:				
  8272                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8273                                  prn_done2:
  8274                                  		;clc
  8275                                  		; cf=0
  8276 0000024E C3                      		retn
  8277                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8278                                  
  8279                                  ;************************************************************************
  8280                                  ;*									*
  8281                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8282                                  ;*									*
  8283                                  ;************************************************************************
  8284                                  
  8285                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8286 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8287 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8288 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8289                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8290                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8291 00000257 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8292 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8293                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8294                                  
  8295                                  ;************************************************************************
  8296                                  ;*									*
  8297                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8298                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8299                                  ;*									*
  8300                                  ;************************************************************************
  8301                                  
  8302                                  prnstat:				
  8303 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8304                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8305                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8306                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8307                                  
  8308                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8309                                  
  8310                                  ;************************************************************************
  8311                                  ;*									*
  8312                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8313                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8314                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8315                                  ;*									*
  8316                                  ;************************************************************************
  8317                                  
  8318                                  prnop:	
  8319 0000025E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8320 00000262 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8321                                  
  8322                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8323                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8324                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8325                                  
  8326 00000264 50                      		push	ax
  8327 00000265 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8328 00000268 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8329 0000026B 58                      		pop	ax
  8330 0000026C 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8331 0000026E 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8332 00000271 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8333                                  
  8334                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8335                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8336                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8337                                  
  8338                                  NextTest:				
  8339 00000274 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8340                                  					; i/o error?
  8341 00000277 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8342                                  
  8343                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8344                                  
  8345 00000279 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8346                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8347 0000027B F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8348 0000027E 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8349 00000280 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8350                                  ret1:					
  8351 00000282 C3                      		retn
  8352                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8353                                  
  8354                                  checknotready:				
  8355 00000283 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8356 00000285 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8357 00000288 C3                      		retn
  8358                                  
  8359                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8360                                  
  8361                                  ;************************************************************************
  8362                                  ;*									*
  8363                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8364                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8365                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8366                                  ;*									*
  8367                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8368                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8369                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8370                                  ;*									*
  8371                                  ;************************************************************************
  8372                                  
  8373                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8374                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8375 00000289 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8376                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8377 0000028B 51                      		push	cx
  8378 0000028C 53                      		push	bx
  8379 0000028D 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8380 0000028F 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8381 00000293 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8382                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8383 00000295 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8384 00000299 5B                      		pop	bx
  8385                                  prn_getstat:				
  8386 0000029A E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8387 0000029D 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8388 0000029F F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8389 000002A2 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8390 000002A4 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8391 000002A5 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8392 000002A7 26                      		es
  8393 000002A8 AC                      		lodsb
  8394                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8395                                  					; lodsb
  8396 000002A9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8397 000002AB E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8398 000002AE 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8399 000002B0 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8400                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8401                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8402                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8403 000002B2 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8404                                  
  8405                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8406                                  
  8407                                  prn_bperr:				
  8408 000002B3 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8409                                  prn_berr:				
  8410 000002B4 E920FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8411                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8412                                  
  8413                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8414                                  
  8415                                  ;************************************************************************
  8416                                  ;*									*
  8417                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8418                                  ;*									*
  8419                                  ;************************************************************************
  8420                                  
  8421                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8422                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8423                                  
  8424                                  ;********************************;*
  8425                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8426                                  ;********************************;*
  8427                                  
  8428                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8429                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8430                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8431                                  
  8432                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8433                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8434                                  ;;endstruc
  8435                                  
  8436                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8437                                  
  8438                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8439                                  
  8440                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8441                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8442 000002B7 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8443 000002BB 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8444                                  					; ioc_pc
  8445 000002C0 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8446                                  
  8447                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8448 000002C2 E910FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8449                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8450                                  
  8451                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8452 000002C5 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8453 000002C9 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8454 000002CD 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8455                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8456 000002CF 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8457 000002D3 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8458                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8459 000002D5 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8460 000002D9 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8461 000002DB 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8462 000002DD 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8463 000002DF 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8464 000002E1 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8465                                  prngetcount:				
  8466                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8467 000002E4 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8468 000002E8 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8469                                  					; return current retry count
  8470                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8471                                  		; cf=0
  8472                                  		;clc
  8473 000002EB C3                      		retn
  8474                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8475                                  
  8476                                  ;************************************************************************
  8477                                  ;*									*
  8478                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8479                                  ;*									*
  8480                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8481                                  ;************************************************************************
  8482                                  
  8483                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  8484 000002EC C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8485 000002F0 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8486                                  					; ioc_pc
  8487 000002F5 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8488 000002F7 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8489 000002FB 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8490 000002FD 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  8491 000002FF 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  8492 00000301 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8493                                  IOCtlSupported:

  8495                                  		; cf=0		
  8496                                  		;clc
  8497 00000303 C3                      		retn

  8499                                  
  8500                                  prn_query_err:
  8501                                  		; 12/12/2022				
  8502                                  		;stc
  8503 00000304 E9CEFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  8504                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8505                                  
  8506                                  ;************************************************************************
  8507                                  ;*									*
  8508                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8509                                  ;*									*
  8510                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8511                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8512                                  ;*									*
  8513                                  ;************************************************************************
  8514                                  
  8515                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8516                                  
  8517                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8518                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8519                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8520                                  
  8521                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8522                                  
  8523                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8524                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8525                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8526                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8527                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8528                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8529                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8530                                  
  8531                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8532                                  
  8533                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8534                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8535                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8536

  8538                                  
  8539                                  ;************************************************************************
  8540                                  ;*									*
  8541                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8542                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8543                                  ;*									*
  8544                                  ;************************************************************************
  8545                                  
  8546                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8547                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8548 00000307 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8549 00000309 E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8550 0000030C 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8551 0000030E 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8552 00000310 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8553 00000312 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8554                                  aux1:					
  8555 00000314 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8556                                  					; won't return if error
  8557                                  aux2:					
  8558 00000317 AA                      		stosb
  8559 00000318 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8560                                  exvec2:					
  8561 0000031A F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8562                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8563 0000031B C3                      		retn

  8565                                  
  8566                                  ;************************************************************************
  8567                                  ;*									*
  8568                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8569                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8570                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8571                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8572                                  ;*									*
  8573                                  ;************************************************************************

  8575                                  auxin:

  8579                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8580                                  		;retn
  8581                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8582 00000324 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn

  8584                                  
  8585                                  arbad:					
  8586 00000326 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8587                                  		;xor	al, al
  8588                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8589                                  		; 11/08/2023
  8590 00000327 B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
  8591 00000329 E9ABFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8592                                  
  8593                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8594                                  
  8595                                  ;************************************************************************
  8596                                  ;*									*
  8597                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8598                                  ;*									*
  8599                                  ;************************************************************************
  8600                                  
  8601                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h

  8604 00000331 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8605 00000333 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8606 00000335 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8607 00000338 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8608 0000033B 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8609 0000033D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8610 0000033F 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8611 00000341 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8612 00000344 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8613                                  auxdrx:					
  8614 00000346 E9A9FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8615                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8616                                  
  8617                                  auxbus:					
  8618 00000349 E97BFE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit

  8620                                  
  8621                                  ;************************************************************************
  8622                                  ;*									*

  8626                                  
  8627                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

  8630 00000351 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8631 00000353 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8632 00000356 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8633                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8634                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  8635                                  		;clc
  8636 00000358 C3                      		retn
  8637                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8638                                  
  8639                                  ;************************************************************************
  8640                                  ;*									*
  8641                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8642                                  ;*									*
  8643                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8644                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8645                                  ;*									*
  8646                                  ;************************************************************************
  8647                                  
  8648                                  auxstat:				
  8649 00000359 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8650                                  
  8651                                  		; fall into auxop
  8652                                  
  8653                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8654                                  
  8655                                  ;************************************************************************
  8656                                  ;*									*
  8657                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8658                                  ;*									*
  8659                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8660                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8661                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8662                                  ;*									*
  8663                                  ;************************************************************************
  8664                                  
  8665                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  8666 0000035B 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8667                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8668                                  					; get port number
  8669 0000035F CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8670                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8671                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8672 00000361 C3                      		retn
  8673                                  
  8674                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8675                                  
  8676                                  ;************************************************************************
  8677                                  ;*									*
  8678                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8679                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8680                                  ;*									*
  8681                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8682                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8683                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8684                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8685                                  ;*									*
  8686                                  ;************************************************************************
  8687                                  
  8688                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8689 00000362 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8690 00000365 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8691                                  					; zero out buffer
  8692                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8693                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8694                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8695 00000368 C3                      		retn
  8696                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8697                                  
  8698                                  ;************************************************************************
  8699                                  ;*									*
  8700                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8701                                  ;*									*
  8702                                  ;************************************************************************
  8703                                  
  8704                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8705                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8706 00000369 E3AF                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8707                                  aux_loop:				
  8708 0000036B 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  8709                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  8710 0000036E 47                      		inc	di
  8711 0000036F B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  8712 00000371 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8713 00000374 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8714 00000377 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  8715 00000379 B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  8716 0000037B E959FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8717                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8718                                  
  8719                                  awok:					
  8720 0000037E E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  8721                                  					; still	more character to print
  8722                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8723                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8724                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8725 00000380 C3                      		retn
  8726                                  
  8727                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8728                                  
  8729                                  ;************************************************************************
  8730                                  ;*									*
  8731                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  8732                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  8733                                  ;*									*
  8734                                  ;************************************************************************
  8735                                  
  8736                                  getbx:
