 10510                                  ; 15/10/52022
 10511                                  
 10512                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10513                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10514                                  ;
 10515                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10516                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10517                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10518                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10519                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10520                                  ;	ds = cs
 10521                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10522                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10523                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10524                                  ;
 10525                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10526                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10527                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10528                                  
 10529                                  diskrd:	
 10530                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 10531                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10532 0000095E C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 10533                                  
 10534                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10535                                  
 10536                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10537                                  diskio:
 10538 00000963 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 10539 00000965 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 10540 00000969 E801FC                  		call	SetDrive
 10541 0000096C 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 10542 00000970 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 10543                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 10544 00000973 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 10545                                  
 10546                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 10547                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 10548                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 10549                                  
 10550 00000975 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 10551                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 10552                                  					; unformatted_media
 10553 0000097A 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 10554 0000097C 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 10555 00000980 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 10556                                  
 10557                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 10558                                  
 10559 00000984 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10560 00000986 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 10561 00000988 01CA                    		add	dx, cx
 10562                                  		;adc	si, 0
 10563                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10564 0000098A D1D6                    		rcl	si, 1
 10565 0000098C 26837D0E00              		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10566                                  					; > 32 bit sector ?
 10567 00000991 740C                    		jz	short sanity32
 10568                                  		;cmp	si, 0
 10569                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10570 00000993 09F6                    		or	si, si
 10571 00000995 75BF                    		jnz	short baddrive
 10572 00000997 263B550E                		cmp	dx, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10573 0000099B 77B9                    		ja	short baddrive
 10574 0000099D EB12                    		jmp	short sanityok
 10575                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10576                                  
 10577                                  sanity32:				
 10578 0000099F 0336[2305]              		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 10579 000009A3 263B751D                		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 10580 000009A7 7208                    		jb	short sanityok
 10581 000009A9 77AB                    		ja	short baddrive
 10582 000009AB 263B551B                		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 10583 000009AF 77A5                    		ja	short baddrive
 10584                                  
 10585                                  sanityok:				
 10586 000009B1 8B16[2305]              		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 10587 000009B5 26034517                		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 10588 000009B9 26135519                		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 10589                                  
 10590                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 10591                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 10592                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 10593                                  
 10594 000009BD A3[2505]                		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 10595                                  
 10596                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 10597                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 10598

 10600                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10601                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10602 000009C1 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 10603 000009C3 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 10604 000009C5 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 10605                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 10606                                  					; current disk parm table
 10607 000009CA 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 10608 000009CE 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es
 10609 000009D2 07                      		pop	es
 10610 000009D3 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10611                                  					; fnon_removable
 10612 000009D8 7510                    		jnz	short skip_setup

 11039                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11040                                  dskerr1:				
 11041 00000C0F 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11042                                  		;jmp	retry
 11043                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11044 00000C10 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11045                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11046                                  
 11047                                  write_fault_err:			
 11048 00000C13 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11049                                  					; for write fault error.
 11050 00000C16 EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11051                                  
 11052                                  		; fall into harderr
 11053                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11054                                  
 11055                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11056                                  
 11057                                  harderr:				
 11058 00000C18 E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11059                                  harderr2:				
 11060 00000C1B C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11061                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11062 00000C20 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11063 00000C24 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11064                                  
 11065                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11066                                  
 11067                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11068                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11069 00000C28 E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11070                                  
 11071                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11072                                  
 11073                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11074                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11075                                  
 11076                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11077                                  normspeed:
 11078 00000C2B 803E[3006]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11079 00000C30 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11080 00000C32 06                      		push	es
 11081 00000C33 50                      		push	ax
 11082 00000C34 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11083 00000C37 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11084 00000C3B 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11085 00000C3F 58                      		pop	ax
 11086 00000C40 07                      		pop	es
 11087 00000C41 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11088 00000C44 06                      		push	es
 11089 00000C45 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11090 00000C49 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11091                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11092 00000C4E 07                      		pop	es
 11093 00000C4F C3                      		retn
 11094                                  
 11095                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11096                                  
 11097                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11098                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11099                                  
 11100                                  fastspeed:		
 11101 00000C50 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11102                                  					; ftoobig
 11103 00000C55 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11104 00000C57 06                      		push	es
 11105 00000C58 8E06[2F05]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11106 00000C5C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11107 00000C5E 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11108 00000C62 07                      		pop	es
 11109 00000C63 C3                      		retn
 11110                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11111                                  
 11112                                  notready:				
 11113 00000C64 F9                      		stc
 11114 00000C65 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11115 00000C67 C3                      		retn
 11116                                  
 11117                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11118                                  
 11119                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11120                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11121                                  
 11122                                  maperror:	
 11123 00000C68 51                      		push	cx
 11124 00000C69 06                      		push	es
 11125 00000C6A 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11126 00000C6B 07                      		pop	es
 11127 00000C6C 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11128 00000C6E A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11129                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 11130 00000C71 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11131                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11132 00000C74 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11133 00000C77 F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11134                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11135                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 11136                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11137 00000C79 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11138                                  					; get translation
 11139                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11140                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11141 00000C7C 07                      		pop	es
 11142 00000C7D 59                      		pop	cx
 11143 00000C7E F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11144 00000C7F C3                      		retn
 11145                                  
 11146                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11147                                  
 11148                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11149                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11150                                  
 11151                                  set_tim:		
 11152 00000C80 50                      		push	ax
 11153 00000C81 E898F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11154                                  
 11155                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11156                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11157                                  
 11158 00000C84 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11159 00000C88 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11160 00000C8A 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11161                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11162                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11163 00000C8E 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11164                                  setaccess:				
 11165 00000C90 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11166 00000C95 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11167 00000C99 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11168                                  done_set:				
 11169 00000C9D F8                      		clc
 11170                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11171 00000C9E 58                      		pop	ax
 11172 00000C9F C3                      		retn
 11173                                  
 11174                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11175                                  
 11176                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11177                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11178                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11179                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11180                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11181                                  
 11182                                  again:	
 11183 00000CA0 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11184 00000CA3 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11185 00000CA6 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11186                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11187 00000CA8 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11188 00000CA9 C3                      		retn
 11189                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11190                                  
 11191                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11192 00000CAA 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11193 00000CAC C3                      		retn

 11208                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11209                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11210                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11211                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11212                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11213                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11214                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11215                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 11228                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 11229                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 11230                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	; ReadTrack
 11231                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack

 11254 00000CB1 [5B0F]                  		dw ReadTrack		; 61h
 11255 00000CB3 [FB0E]                  		dw VerifyTrack		; 62h
 11256 00000CB5 [150D]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc

 11274                                  ; IOC_DC_Table
 11275                                  ;
 11276                                  ; This table contains all of the valid generic IOCtl Minor codes for
 11277                                  ; major function 08 to be used by the Ioctl_Support_Query function.
 11278                                  ; Added for 5.00
 11279                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11280                                  
 11281 00000CD2 60                      IOC_DC_Table:	db 60h			; GET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS
 11282 00000CD3 40                      		db 40h			; SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS
 11283 00000CD4 61                      		db 61h			; READ_TRACK
 11284 00000CD5 41                      		db 41h			; WRITE_TRACK
 11285 00000CD6 62                      		db 62h			; VERIFY_TRACK
 11286 00000CD7 42                      		db 42h			; FORMAT_TRACK
 11287 00000CD8 66                      		db 66h			; GET_MEDIA_ID
 11288 00000CD9 46                      		db 46h			; SET_MEDIA_ID
 11289 00000CDA 67                      		db 67h			; GET_ACCESS_FLAG
 11290 00000CDB 47                      		db 47h			; SET_ACCESS_FLAG
 11291 00000CDC 68                      		db 68h			; SENSE_MEDIA_TYPE
 11292

 11297                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11298                                  
 11299                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11300                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11301                                  ;
 11302                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11303                                  ;
 11304                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11305                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11306                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11307                                  ;
 11308                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11309                                  
 11310                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11311                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11312                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11313 00000CDD E88DF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11314 00000CE0 06                      		push	es
 11315 00000CE1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11316 00000CE5 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11317                                  					; RAWIO
 11318 00000CEA 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11319 00000CEE 07                      		pop	es
 11320 00000CEF 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11321                                  
 11322                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11323                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11324                                  
 11325                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11326 00000CF1 BE[AE0C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11327                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11328                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11329 00000CF4 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11330 00000CF6 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11331                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11332 00000CF8 BE[C10C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11333                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11334                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11335                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11336 00000CFB 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11337 00000CFD 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11338 00000CFF 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11339 00000D02 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11340 00000D04 98                      		cbw
 11341 00000D05 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11342 00000D07 46                      		inc	si
 11343 00000D08 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11344 00000D0A 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11345                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11346 00000D0D 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11347                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11348                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11349 00000D12 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11350 00000D14 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11351                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11352                                  
 11353                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11354                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11355                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11356 00000D15 5A                      		pop	dx
 11357                                  
 11358                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11359 00000D16 E9BCF3                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 11360                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11361                                  
 11362                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11363                                  
 11364                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11365                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11366                                  ;
 11367                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11368                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11369                                  ;
 11370                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11371                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11372                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11373                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11374                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11375                                  
 11376                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11377                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11378                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11379                                  
 11380 00000D19 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11381 00000D1D C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11382                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11383 00000D20 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11384 00000D24 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11385 00000D27 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11386 00000D2B 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11387                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11388 00000D2E 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11389 00000D31 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11390 00000D35 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11391 00000D38 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11392 00000D3A 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11393                                  					
 11394                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11395 00000D3D 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11396 00000D40 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11397                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11398 00000D43 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11399 00000D45 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11400 00000D46 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11401                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11402                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11403                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 11404 00000D4B E887FB                  		call	checksingle
 11405 00000D4E E842F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 11406 00000D51 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 11407 00000D52 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 11408 00000D54 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 11409                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11410                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 11411 00000D57 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 11412                                  					; This is where	the result goes
 11413 00000D5A B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 11414                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 11415 00000D5D 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 11416 00000D5E 06                      		push	es
 11417 00000D5F 1F                      		pop	ds
 11418 00000D60 07                      		pop	es
 11419 00000D61 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 11420                                  		
 11421                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11422                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 11423                                  		;clc
 11424                                  GetParmRet:				
 11425 00000D63 C3                      		retn
 11426                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11427                                  
 11428                                  ; 17/10/2022
 11429                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11430                                  
 11431                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11432                                  ; SetDeviceParameters:
 11433                                  ;
 11434                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11435                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11436                                  
 11437                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11438                                  SetDeviceParameters:			; 2C7h:0CF3h = 70h:3263h
 11439 00000D64 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11440 00000D68 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11441 00000D6B 26814D234001            		or	word [es:di+23h], 140h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11442                                  					; fchanged_by_format|fchanged
 11443 00000D71 F60702                  		test	byte [bx], 2	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11444                                  					; ONLY_SET_TRACKLAYOUT
 11445 00000D74 7579                    		jnz	short setTrackTable
 11446 00000D76 8A4701                  		mov	al, [bx+1]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11447 00000D79 26884522                		mov	[es:di+34], al	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11448 00000D7D 8B4704                  		mov	ax, [bx+4]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11449 00000D80 26894525                		mov	[es:di+37], ax	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11450 00000D84 8B4702                  		mov	ax, [bx+2]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11451 00000D87 1E                      		push	ds
 11452                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11453 00000D88 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11454                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11455                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11456                                  		;cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 11457 00000D8D 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 11458 00000D92 1F                      		pop	ds
 11459 00000D93 7502                    		jnz	short HaveChange ; we have changeline support
 11460                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11461 00000D95 24FD                    		and	al, 0FDh
 11462                                  		;and	ax, 0FFFDh	; ~fchangeline
 11463

 11597                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11598                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11599                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11600                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11601                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11602                                  ;
 11603                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11604                                  ;
 11605                                  ; output:
 11606                                  ;	for status call:
 11607                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11608                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11609                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11610                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11611                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11612                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11613                                  ;
 11614                                  ;	for format track:
 11615                                  ;		carry set if error
 11616                                  ;
 11617                                  ; ==========================================================================

 11882                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 11883                                  
 11884                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11885                                  
 11886                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11887                                  
 11888                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11889                                  ;
 11890                                  ; TrackIo:
 11891                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11892                                  ;
 11893                                  ;   input:
 11894                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11895                                  ;		  3 = write
 11896                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11897                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11898                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11899                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11900                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11901                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11902                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11903                                  ;
 11904                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11905                                  
 11906                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11907                                  		
 11908                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11909                                  TrackIo:	
 11910                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11911 00000F8F 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11912 00000F93 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 11913 00000F96 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11914                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 11915 00000F9B 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 11916 00000F9D 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11917 00000F9E 51                      		push	cx
 11918 00000F9F E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 11919 00000FA2 59                      		pop	cx
 11920 00000FA3 58                      		pop	ax
 11921                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 11922 00000FA4 BE[3305]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 11923 00000FA7 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11924 00000FA9 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11925 00000FAB 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11926                                  
 11927                                  		; WE WANT:
 11928                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 11929                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 11930                                  		
 11931 00000FAD BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 11932                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11933 00000FB0 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 11934                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11935                                  					; good_tracklayout
 11936 00000FB5 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 11937                                  		
 11938 00000FB7 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 11939                                  ionextsector:				
 11940 00000FB9 51                      		push	cx
 11941 00000FBA 52                      		push	dx
 11942 00000FBB 46                      		inc	si
 11943 00000FBC 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 11944                                  					; the track table
 11945 00000FBD AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 11946 00000FBE A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 11947                                  
 11948                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 11949                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 11950                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 11951                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 11952                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 11953                                  		
 11954                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11955 00000FC1 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11956                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11957                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 11958 00000FC6 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 11959                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11960 00000FC8 F606[2705]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 11961                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11962                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 11963 00000FCD 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 11964 00000FCF 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 11965 00000FD3 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11966 00000FD5 E816FB                  		call	Disk
 11967 00000FD8 5A                      		pop	dx
 11968 00000FD9 59                      		pop	cx
 11969 00000FDA F8                      		clc
 11970 00000FDB C3                      		retn
 11971                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11972                                  
 11973                                  IoRemovable:				
 11974 00000FDC AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 11975                                  					; table	and save it
 11976 00000FDD 50                      		push	ax
 11977 00000FDE 56                      		push	si
 11978 00000FDF 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 11979 00000FE0 50                      		push	ax
 11980 00000FE1 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 11981                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 11982 00000FE5 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11983 00000FE9 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 11984 00000FEC 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 11985 00000FEF 58                      		pop	ax
 11986 00000FF0 1F                      		pop	ds
 11987 00000FF1 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 11988 00000FF3 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 11989 00000FF6 E8F5FA                  		call	Disk
 11990 00000FF9 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 11991                                  					; sector size
 11992 00000FFA 58                      		pop	ax
 11993                                  
 11994                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 11995                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 11996 00000FFB 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 11997 00000FFD B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 11998 00001000 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 11999                                  
 12000 00001002 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 12001 00001004 5A                      		pop	dx
 12002 00001005 59                      		pop	cx
 12003 00001006 E2B1                    		loop	ionextsector
 12004 00001008 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12005                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 12006                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12007 0000100D 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 12008 0000100F E867FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 12009                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 12010                                  NoNeedDone:
 12011 00001012 F8                      		clc
 12012                                  NoNeedDone2:
 12013 00001013 C3                      		retn

 12017                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12018                                  ;
 12019                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12020                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12021                                  ; are permissible.
 12022                                  ;
 12023                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12024                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12025                                  ; All other registers preserved
 12026                                  ;

 12035                                  ;		retn

 12058                                  ; SetDASD
 12059                                  ;

 12061                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.

 12067                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12068                                  SetDasd:
 12069 00001014 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12070                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12071 00001019 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12072                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12073 0000101B 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h

 12075                                  					; set_dasd_true

 12080                                  					; ~set_dasd_true

 12091 0000103C 80FC01                  		cmp	ah, 1
 12092                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12093                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12094                                  		;jz	short GotBig

 12096                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 12097                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12098 00001041 750E                    		jnz	short DoSet

 12101                                  
 12102                                  GotBig:
 12103                                  		;mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive

 12106 00001044 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12107 00001049 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12108                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12109                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12110                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 12111                                  		; 18/12/2022

 12121 00001055 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si	; 0
 12122                                  
 12123 00001057 C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 12124                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 12125                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 12126

 12128                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]

 12133 00001067 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12134                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12135                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12136 00001069 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12137 0000106D 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah

 12140                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12141                                  
 12142                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12143                                  
 12144                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12145                                  ;
 12146                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12147                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12148                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12149                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12150                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12151                                  ;
 12152                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12153                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12154                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12155                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12156                                  ;
 12157                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12158                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12159                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12160                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12161                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12162                                  ;
 12163                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12164                                  
 12165                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12166                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12167 00001072 51                      		push	cx
 12168 00001073 52                      		push	dx
 12169                                  
 12170                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12171                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12172                                  
 12173 00001074 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12174 00001079 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12175 0000107B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12176 0000107D 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12177 00001082 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12178 00001084 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12179                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12180                                  
 12181                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12182 00001086 06                      		push	es
 12183 00001087 56                      		push	si
 12184                                  		
 12185                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12186                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12187 00001088 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12188 0000108A 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12189                                  
 12190 0000108C 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12191                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12192                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12193 00001091 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12194 00001095 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12195                                  
 12196                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12197                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12198                                  
 12199 00001099 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12200 0000109E 5E                      		pop	si
 12201 0000109F 07                      		pop	es
 12202                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 12203 000010A0 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12204 000010A4 49                      		dec	cx
 12205 000010A5 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12206 000010A8 D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12207 000010AA D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12208 000010AC 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12209 000010AE 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12210 000010B2 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12211 000010B6 06                      		push	es
 12212 000010B7 1E                      		push	ds
 12213 000010B8 56                      		push	si
 12214 000010B9 57                      		push	di
 12215 000010BA B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12216 000010BC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12217                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12218 000010BE 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12219 000010C0 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12220 000010C5 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12221 000010C7 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12222                                  
 12223                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12224                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12225 000010C8 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12226 000010CA 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12227 000010CC 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12228                                  
 12229 000010CD 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12230                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12231                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12232 000010D2 8936[3206]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12233 000010D6 8C06[3406]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12234                                  
 12235                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12236                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12237                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12238                                  		;mov	es, si
 12239 000010DA 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12240                                  
 12241                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12242 000010DB 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12243                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12244 000010E0 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12245 000010E5 C606[3006]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12246                                  skip_disk_base_setting:
 12247 000010EA 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12248                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag

 12250 000010EF EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet

 12258                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12259 000010F6 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb

 12278                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.

 12298                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12299                                  
 12300                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12301                                  
 12302                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12303                                  ;
 12304                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12305                                  ;
 12306                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12307                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12308                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12309                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12310                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12311                                  ;
 12312                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12313                                  
 12314                                  ResetDisk:
 12315 00001106 50                      		push	ax
 12316                                  
 12317                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12318 00001107 B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 12319 0000110A 3806[3006]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 12320                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12321                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12322 0000110E 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12323                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12324                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12325 00001110 A2[3106]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 12326                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 12327                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 12328                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12329 00001113 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12330                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12331 00001115 C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12332                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12333 0000111A 58                      		pop	ax
 12334 0000111B C3                      		retn
 12335                                  
 12336                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12337                                  
 12338                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12339                                  
 12340                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12341                                  ;
 12342                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12343                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12344                                  ;
 12345                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12346                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12347                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12348                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12349                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12350                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12351                                  ;
 12352                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12353                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12354                                  ;
 12355                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12358                                  ToRom:

 12364                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]

 12414                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12415                                  ;
 12416                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12417                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12418                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.

 12423                                  ioctl_getown:
 12424 00001174 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12425 00001177 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12426                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12427 0000117B C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12428                                  ownloop:

 12438 0000118F EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop

 12539                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12540                                  ;	get media id
 12541                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12542                                  ;
 12543                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12544                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12545                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12546                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12547                                  ;
 12548                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12549                                  ;
 12550                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12551                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12552                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12553                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12554                                  ;
 12555                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12556                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12557                                  ;
 12558                                  ; LOGIC:
 12559                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12560                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12561                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12562                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12563                                  ;
 12564                                  ; {
 12565                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12566                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12567                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12568                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12569                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12570                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12571                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12572                                  ;		};
 12573                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12574                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12575                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12576                                  ;		};
 12577                                  ;	else
 12578                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12579                                  ;
 12580                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12581                                  
 12582                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12583                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12584                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12585                                  
 12586                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12587                                  GetMediaId:
 12588 000011E5 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12589 000011E8 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12590 000011EC C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12591 000011F1 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12592 000011F4 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12593                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12594 000011F6 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12595                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12596 000011FB 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12597                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12598 000011FD BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12599 00001200 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12600                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12601                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12602 00001203 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12603 00001205 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12604 00001209 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12605                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12606 0000120D 46                      		inc	si
 12607                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12608                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12609 0000120E 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12610 00001211 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12611                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12612                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12613 00001214 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12614                                  	
 12615                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12616                                  		; cf = 0
 12617                                  		;clc
 12618                                  
 12619 00001216 C3                      		retn
 12620                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12621                                  
 12622                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12623 00001217 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12624 00001219 F9                      		stc
 12625                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12626 0000121A C3                      		retn
 12627                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12628                                  
 12629                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12630                                  
 12631                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12632                                  ;  set media id
 12633                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12634                                  
 12635                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12636                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12637                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12638                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12639                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12640                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12641                                  ;
 12642                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12643                                  ;
 12644                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12645                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12646                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12647                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12648                                  ;
 12649                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12650                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12651                                  ;
 12652                                  ; logic:
 12653                                  ;
 12654                                  ; {
 12655                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12656                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12657                                  ;	BootIo;
 12658                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12659                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12660                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12661                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12662                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12663                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12664                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12665                                  ;		};
 12666                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12667                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12668                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12669                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12670                                  ;		};
 12671                                  ;	else
 12672                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12673                                  ;
 12674                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12675                                  
 12676                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12677                                  SetMediaId:
 12678 0000121B E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12679 0000121E 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12680                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12681 00001222 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12682 00001224 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12683 00001229 52                      		push	dx
 12684 0000122A E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12685 0000122D 5A                      		pop	dx
 12686 0000122E 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12687                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12688 00001230 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12689                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12690 00001235 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12691 00001237 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12692                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12693 0000123C 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12694 0000123E 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12695 0000123F 57                      		push	di
 12696 00001240 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12697 00001241 07                      		pop	es
 12698 00001242 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12699 00001245 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12700 00001249 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12701 0000124C 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12702 0000124F B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12703                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12704                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12705 00001252 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12706 00001254 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12707 00001255 1F                      		pop	ds
 12708 00001256 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12709 00001257 07                      		pop	es
 12710 00001258 E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12711 0000125B 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12712 0000125D C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12713 00001262 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12714 00001265 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12715                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12716                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12717 0000126A C3                      		retn
 12718                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12719                                  
 12720                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12721 0000126B B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12722 0000126D F9                      		stc
 12723                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12724 0000126E C3                      		retn
