 14399                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14400                                  
 14401                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14402                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14403                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14404                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14405                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14406                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14407                                  
 14408                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14409 000017F1 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14410 000017F3 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14410 000017FC 736B6574746520666F-
 14410 00001805 7220647269766520   
 14411                                  
 14412                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14413 0000180D 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14413 00001816 65737320616E79206B-
 14413 0000181F 6579207768656E2072-
 14413 00001828 656164790D0A       
 14414 0000182E 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14415                                  
 14416                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14417                                  
 14418                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14419                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14420                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14421                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14422                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14423                                  
 14424                                  chkopcnt:		
 14425 00001830 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14426 00001835 C3                      		retn
 14427                                  
 14428                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14429                                  
 14430                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14431                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14432                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14433                                  ;
 14434                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14435                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14436                                  
 14437                                  mediacheck:	
 14438 00001836 E89CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14439 00001839 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14440 0000183B E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14441 0000183E 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14442 00001840 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14443 00001843 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14444 00001845 50                      		push	ax
 14445 00001846 52                      		push	dx
 14446 00001847 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14447                                  					; set logical drive number
 14448 0000184B B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14449 0000184D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14450                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14451                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14452 0000184F 5A                      		pop	dx
 14453 00001850 58                      		pop	ax
 14454 00001851 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14455 00001853 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14456                                  
 14457                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14458                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14459                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14460                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14461                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14462                                  ; status.
 14463                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14464 00001856 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14465 0000185A 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14466                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14467                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14468                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14469                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14470 0000185E 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14471                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14472                                  
 14473                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14474                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14475                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14476                                  
 14477 00001860 50                      		push	ax
 14478 00001861 51                      		push	cx
 14479 00001862 52                      		push	dx
 14480 00001863 E88DED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14481 00001866 5A                      		pop	dx
 14482 00001867 59                      		pop	cx
 14483 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 14484 00001869 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14485 0000186B 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14486                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14487 0000186D 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14488                                  mediaret:				
 14489 0000186F C3                      		retn
 14490                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14491                                  
 14492                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14493                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14494                                  ; or write.
 14495                                  
 14496                                  mediadovolid:				
 14497 00001870 E820EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14498 00001873 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14499 00001875 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14500 00001878 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14501 0000187A E9EBF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14502                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14503                                  
 14504                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14505                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14506                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14507                                  ; dos.
 14508                                  ;
 14509                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14510                                  
 14511                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14512                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14513                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14514                                  
 14515                                  checklatchio:	
 14516                                  
 14517                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14518                                  			
 14519 0000187D E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14520 00001880 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14521                                  
 14522                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14523                                  
 14524 00001882 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 14525 00001885 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14526                                  
 14527                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14528                                  ; expensive verification.
 14529                                  
 14530 00001887 E809EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14531 0000188A 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14532 0000188C E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14533 0000188F 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14534 00001891 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14535 00001893 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14536 00001895 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 14537                                  checklatchret:				
 14538 00001898 E8CDF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14539                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14540 0000189B F9                      		stc
 14541 0000189C 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14542                                  checkret:				
 14543 0000189D C3                      		retn
 14544                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14545                                  
 14546                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14547                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14548                                  ;
 14549                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14550                                  
 14551                                  checkfatvid:				
 14552 0000189E E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14553 000018A1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14554 000018A3 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14555                                  
 14556                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14557                                  
 14558                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14559                                  
 14560                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14561                                  
 14562                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14563                                  ;
 14564                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14565                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14566                                  ;
 14567                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14568                                  ;
 14569                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14570                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14571                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14572                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14573                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14574                                  ;
 14575                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14576                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14577                                  ; routine.)
 14578                                  ;
 14579                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14580                                  
 14581                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14582                                  check_vid:
 14583                                  
 14584                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14585                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14586                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14587                                  
 14588 000018A5 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14589                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14590                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14591 000018AA 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14592 000018AC E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 14593 000018AF 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14594 000018B1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14595 000018B3 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14596                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14597 000018B8 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14598                                  					; if not fat system
 14599 000018BA E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 14600 000018BD 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14601 000018BF E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 14602 000018C2 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14603                                  					; definitely changed
 14604 000018C5 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14605                                  
 14606 000018C7 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14607                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14608 000018C8 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 14609                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14610                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14611                                  		;clc
 14612                                  checkfatret:				
 14613 000018CB C3                      		retn
 14614                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14615                                  
 14616                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14617                                  changed_drv:
 14618 000018CC F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14619 000018CD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14620                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14621 000018D2 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14622                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14623                                  
 14624                                  ; extended id check
 14625                                  
 14626                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14627                                  
 14628                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14629                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14630                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14631                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14632                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14633                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14634                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14635                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14636                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14637                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14638                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14639                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14640                                  ;
 14641                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14642                                  
 14643                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14644                                  do_ext_check_id:
 14645 000018D3 50                      		push	ax
 14646                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14647                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14648 000018D4 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14649                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14650 000018D7 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 14651 000018D9 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14652 000018DD 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14653 000018DF A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14654 000018E2 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14655 000018E6 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14656                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 14657                                  					; don't know
 14658 000018E8 58                      		pop	ax
 14659 000018E9 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14660                                  					; reset the flag
 14661                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14662                                  
 14663                                  ext_changed:
 14664 000018EB 58                      		pop	ax
 14665                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14666 000018EC 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 14667                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14668                                  					; disk changed!
 14669                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14670                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14671                                  		;clc
 14672 000018ED EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14673                                  
 14674                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14675                                  
 14676                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14677                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14678                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14679                                  ;
 14680                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14681                                  
 14682                                  checkio:				
 14683 000018EF 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14684 000018F2 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14685 000018F4 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14686 000018F7 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14687 000018F9 E897ED                  		call	GetBp
 14688 000018FC 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14689 000018FE E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14690 00001901 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14691 00001903 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14692 00001905 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14693 00001907 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14694 00001908 C3                      		retn
 14695                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14696                                  
 14697                                  checkioerr:				
 14698 00001909 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14699                                  
 14700                                  checkioret:				
 14701 0000190C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14702 0000190D E908F3                  		jmp	harderr
 14703                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14704                                  
 14705                                  no_error_map:				
 14706 00001910 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 14707                                  
 14708                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14709                                  
 14710                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14711                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14712                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14713                                  
 14714                                  returnvid:		
 14715 00001913 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14716                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14717 00001916 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14718 00001919 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14719 0000191B F9                      		stc
 14720 0000191C C3                      		retn
 14721                                  
 14722                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14723                                  
 14724                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14725                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14726                                  ;
 14727                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14728                                  ; **trashes si**
 14729                                  
 14730                                  media_set_vid:				
 14731 0000191D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14732                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14733                                  
 14734                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14735                                  
 14736                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14737                                  
 14738                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14739                                  
 14740                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14741                                  vid_into_packet:
 14742 00001920 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14743 00001921 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14744 00001925 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14745 00001928 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14746 0000192A 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14747 0000192D 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14748 00001930 1F                      		pop	ds
 14749                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14750 00001931 C3                      		retn
 14751                                  
 14752                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14753                                  
 14754                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14755                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14756                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14757                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14758                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14759                                  ;
 14760                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14761                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14762                                  ;
 14763                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14764                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14765                                  ;		carry set
 14766                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14767                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14768                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14769                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14770                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14771                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14772                                  ;
 14773                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14774                                  
 14775                                  hidensity:
 14776                                  
 14777                                  ; check for correct drive
 14778                                  		
 14779                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14780 00001932 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14781                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14782                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14783 00001937 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14784                                  
 14785                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14786                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14787                                  
 14788 00001939 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14789 0000193E 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14790                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14791                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14792 00001940 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14793 00001943 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14794                                  
 14795                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14796                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14797                                  
 14798                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14799 00001945 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14800 00001949 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 14801                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14802                                  					; ffOther
 14803 0000194B 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 14804 0000194D 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 14805                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14806                                  					; ff288
 14807 0000194F 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 14808 00001951 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14809 00001953 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14810                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14811                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14812 00001956 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14813                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14814                                  					; 2 sides
 14815                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14816 00001959 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 14817 0000195A BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14818                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14819                                  					; & head max
 14820                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14821 0000195D E9A5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14822                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14823                                  
 14824                                  Is720K:
 14825                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14826 00001960 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 14827                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14828 00001961 E968ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14829                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14830                                  
 14831                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14832                                  ;dofloppy:
 14833                                  		;retn
 14834                                  
 14835                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14836                                  
 14837                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14838                                  
 14839                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14840                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14841                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14842                                  ;
 14843                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14844                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14845                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14846                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14847                                  ;
 14848                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14849                                  ;
 14850                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14851                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14852                                  
 14853                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14854 00001964 06                      		push	es
 14855 00001965 57                      		push	di
 14856                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14857                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14858 00001966 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14859                                  
 14860                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14861                                  
 14862                                  scan_bds:				
 14863 0000196A 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14864 0000196E 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14865                                  
 14866                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14867                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14868                                  
 14869 00001970 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14870                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14871                                  get_next_bds:				
 14872 00001974 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14873                                  					; go to	next bds
 14874 00001977 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14875 0000197A 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14876 0000197C 5F                      		pop	di
 14877 0000197D 07                      		pop	es
 14878 0000197E C3                      		retn
 14879                                  
 14880                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14881                                  
 14882                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14883                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14884                                  ;
 14885                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14886                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14887                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14888                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14889                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14890                                  
 14891                                  checkromchange:	
 14892                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14893                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14894 0000197F 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14895                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14896                                  					; fchanged
 14897 00001984 C3                      		retn
 14898                                  
 14899                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14900                                  
 14901                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14902                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14903                                  ;
 14904                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14905                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14906                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14907                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14908                                  
 14909                                  resetchanged:	
 14910                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14911                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14912 00001985 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14913                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14914                                  					; ~fchanged
 14915 0000198A C3                      		retn
 14916                                  
 14917                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14918                                  
 14919                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14920                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14921                                  ;
 14922                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14923                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14924                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14925                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14926                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14927                                  
 14928                                  haschange:
 14929                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14930                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14931 0000198B 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14932                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14933                                  					; fchangeline
 14934 00001990 C3                      		retn
 14935                                  
 14936                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14937                                  
 14938                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14939                                  
 14940                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14941                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14942                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14943                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14944                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14945                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14946                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14947                                  
 14948                                  ; set_volume_id
 14949                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14950                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14951                                  ;
 14952                                  ;   on entry:
 14953                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14954                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14955                                  ;
 14956                                  ;   on exit:
 14957                                  ;	carry clear:
 14958                                  ;	   successful call
 14959                                  ;	carry set
 14960                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14961                                  
 14962                                  set_volume_id:				
 14963 00001991 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14964 00001992 50                      		push	ax
 14965 00001993 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14966 00001996 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14967 00001998 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14968 0000199B 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14969 0000199D E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14970 000019A0 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14971                                  setvret:				
 14972                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14973                                  		; cf = 0
 14974                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14975 000019A3 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14976 000019A4 5A                      		pop	dx
 14977 000019A5 C3                      		retn
 14978                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14979                                  
 14980                                  seterr:					
 14981 000019A6 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14982 000019A7 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14983 000019A8 C3                      		retn
 14984                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14985 000019A9 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14986                                  
 14987                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14988                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14989                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14990                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14991                                  
 14992                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14993                                  
 14994                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14995                                  
 14996                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14997                                  ;
 14998                                  ;   on entry:
 14999                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15000                                  ;
 15001                                  ;   on exit:
 15002                                  ;	carry clear
 15003                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15004                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15005                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15006                                  ;
 15007                                  ;	carry set:
 15008                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15009                                  
 15010                                  read_volume_id:
 15011 000019AB 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15012 000019AC 51                      		push	cx
 15013 000019AD 53                      		push	bx
 15014 000019AE 50                      		push	ax
 15015 000019AF 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15016 000019B0 57                      		push	di
 15017 000019B1 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15018 000019B2 07                      		pop	es
 15019 000019B3 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15020 000019B6 BE[9F08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15021                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15022 000019B9 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15023 000019BC F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15024 000019BE 5F                      		pop	di
 15025 000019BF 07                      		pop	es
 15026 000019C0 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15027                                  					; # of fats
 15028 000019C4 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15029                                  					; sectors / fat
 15030 000019C8 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15031 000019CA 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15032                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15033                                  					;
 15034                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15035                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15036 000019CE 2EA3[A919]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15037                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15038                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15039 000019D2 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15040                                  					; # root dir entries
 15041 000019D6 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15042 000019D8 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15043                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15044                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15045 000019DA 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15046                                  next_sec:
 15047 000019DB 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15048 000019DC 2EA1[A919]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15049                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15050                                  					; get sector #
 15051 000019E0 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15052                                  					; sectors / track
 15053 000019E4 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15054 000019E6 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15055                                  
 15056                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15057                                  
 15058 000019E8 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15059                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15060 000019E9 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15061 000019EB 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15062 000019ED 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15063                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15064 000019F1 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15065 000019F3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15066 000019F5 E81BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15067                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15068 000019F8 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15069 000019FA B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15070 000019FD B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15071                                  fvid_loop:
 15072                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15073 000019FF 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15074                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15075 00001A01 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15076 00001A03 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15077 00001A06 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15078 00001A08 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15079 00001A0B 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15080                                  ent_loop:
 15081 00001A0D 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15082 00001A10 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15083 00001A12 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15084 00001A13 2EFF06[A919]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15085                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15086                                  					; next sector
 15087 00001A18 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15088                                  notfound:
 15089                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15090                                  		;xor	si, si
 15091 00001A1A EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15092                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15093                                  
 15094                                  found_vid:
 15095                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15096                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15097 00001A1C 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15098 00001A1D 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15099 00001A1F 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15100 00001A20 57                      		push	di
 15101 00001A21 1E                      		push	ds
 15102 00001A22 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15103 00001A23 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15104 00001A26 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15105                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15106 00001A29 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15107                                  		;xor	al, al
 15108                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15109 00001A2B 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15110 00001A2C AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15111                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15112                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15113                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15114 00001A2D 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15115 00001A2E 07                      		pop	es
 15116                                  fvid_ret:
 15117                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15118 00001A2F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15119                                  				
 15120 00001A31 58                      		pop	ax
 15121                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15122                                  		; cf = 0
 15123                                  		;clc
 15124                                  rvidret:
 15125 00001A32 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15126 00001A33 59                      		pop	cx
 15127 00001A34 5A                      		pop	dx
 15128 00001A35 C3                      		retn
 15129                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15130                                  
 15131                                  no_vid:
 15132 00001A36 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15133                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15134                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15135 00001A37 EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15136                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15137                                  
 15138                                  readviderr:
 15139 00001A39 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15140 00001A3A 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15141 00001A3B EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15142                                  
 15143                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15144                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15145                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15146                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15147 00001A3D BE[AB08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15148                                  		;
 15149                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15150                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15151                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15152                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15153 00001A40 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15154 00001A43 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15155                                  		;
 15156 00001A46 FC                      		cld
 15157 00001A47 C3                      		retn
 15158                                  
 15159                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15160                                  
 15161                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15162                                  ;
 15163                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15164                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15165                                  
 15166                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15167 00001A48 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15168 00001A49 56                      		push	si
 15169 00001A4A 51                      		push	cx
 15170                                  		
 15171                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15172                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15173                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15174                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15175                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15176                                  		;cld
 15177                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15178 00001A4B E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15179                                  
 15180 00001A4E F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15181 00001A50 59                      		pop	cx
 15182 00001A51 5E                      		pop	si
 15183 00001A52 5F                      		pop	di
 15184 00001A53 C3                      		retn
 15185                                  
 15186                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15187                                  
 15188                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15189                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15190                                  ;
 15191                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15192                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15193                                  
 15194                                  check_volume_id:
 15195 00001A54 57                      		push	di
 15196 00001A55 51                      		push	cx
 15197                                  		
 15198                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15199                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15200                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15201                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15202                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15203                                  		;cld
 15204                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15205 00001A56 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15206                                  
 15207 00001A59 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15208 00001A5B 59                      		pop	cx
 15209 00001A5C 5F                      		pop	di
 15210 00001A5D C3                      		retn
 15211                                  
 15212                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15213                                  
 15214                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15215                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15216                                  ;
 15217                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15218                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15219                                  ;
 15220                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15221                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15222                                  ;
 15223                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15224                                  
 15225                                  fat_check:		
 15226 00001A5E 50                      		push	ax
 15227 00001A5F 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15228 00001A61 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15229 00001A64 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15230                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15231 00001A68 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15232 00001A6A 4E                      		dec	si
 15233                                  okret1:					
 15234 00001A6B 58                      		pop	ax
 15235 00001A6C C3                      		retn
 15236                                  
 15237                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15238                                  
 15239                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15240                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15241                                  
 15242                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15243                                  
 15244                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15245                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15246                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15247                                  
 15248                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15249                                  
 15250                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15251                                  		;db 0
 15252                                  
 15253                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15254                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15255                                  
 15256                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15257 00001A6D 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15258                                  %endif
 15259                                  
 15260                                  ;align 16
 15261                                  
 15262                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15263                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15264                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15265                                  BCODEEND:
 15266                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15267                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15268                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15269                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15270                                  ;SYSINITOFFSET	equ $-$$
 15271                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15272                                  
 15273                                  ; 28/09/2023
 15274                                  S2SIZE equ $-$$
