 30737                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30738                                  ;*** toDigit - converts a character-digit to its binary counterpart
 30739                                  ;            -- verifies that CL contains a valid character-digit; if so, it
 30740                                  ; changes CL to its counterpart binary digit ((CL-'0') or (CL-'A'+10)).
 30741                                  ; A-F are considered valid if gnradix is 16.
 30742                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30743                                  ; ENTRY:    CL contains a digit ('0' to '9' or, if gnradix==16, 'A' to 'F')
 30744                                  ; EXIT:     CL contains digit in binary (0 to 9 or, if gnradix==16, 0 to 15)
 30745                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set indicates invalid digit; carry clear indicates good digit
 30746                                  ; USES:     CL, Flags
 30747                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30748                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 30749                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 30750                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 30751                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30752                                  
 30753                                  gnradix:
 30754 00002B7D 0000                    	dw	0		; Must be a word--16x16 multiplication
 30755                                  
 30756                                  toDigit:
 30757 00002B7F 2E833E[7D2B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 30758 00002B85 751C                    	jne	short td20	; Don't check hex digits if radix isn't 16
 30759                                  
 30760                                  toDigit_hex:
 30761 00002B87 80F961                  	cmp	cl,'a'	; 61h
 30762 00002B8A 7209                    	jb	short td10
 30763 00002B8C 80F966                  	cmp	cl,'f'	; 66h
 30764 00002B8F 7720                    	ja	short tdE	; Nothing valid above 'f' at all...
 30765 00002B91 80E957                  	sub	cl,'a'-10 ; 57h	; Make 'a'==10 and return.
 30766                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 30767 00002B94 C3                      	retn
 30768                                  td10:	
 30769 00002B95 80F941                  	cmp	cl,'A'  ; 41h
 30770 00002B98 7209                    	jb	short td20	; Below 'A'? Not a letter...
 30771 00002B9A 80F946                  	cmp	cl,'F'	; 46h
 30772 00002B9D 7712                    	ja	short tdE	; Above 'F'? Not a digit.
 30773 00002B9F 80E937                  	sub	cl,'A'-10 ; 37h	; Make 'A'==10 and return.
 30774                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 30775 00002BA2 C3                      	retn
 30776                                  toDigit_dec:
 30777                                  td20:	
 30778 00002BA3 80F930                  	cmp	cl,'0'		; If less than zero,
 30779                                  	;jb	short tdE	; Done.
 30780 00002BA6 720A                    	jb	short tdEr ; 08/04/2019
 30781 00002BA8 80F939                  	cmp	cl,'9'		; Or, if greater than nine,
 30782 00002BAB 7704                    	ja	short tdE	; Done.
 30783 00002BAD 80E930                  	sub	cl,'0'	; 30h	; Okay--make '0'==0 and return.
 30784                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 30785 00002BB0 C3                      	retn
 30786                                  tdE:	
 30787 00002BB1 F9                      	stc
 30788                                  tdEr:		; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 30789 00002BB2 C3                      	retn
 30790                                  
 30791                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30792                                  ;*** GetXNum - reads a 32-bit ASCII number at ES:SI and returns it in DX:AX
 30793                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30794                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:SI points to an ascii string to scan
 30795                                  ; EXIT:     ES:SI moved to first invalid digit, DX:AX contains value read
 30796                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if # is too big, or has no digits (EOL possibly)
 30797                                  ; USES:     ES:SI, DX, AX, Flags, gnradix
 30798                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30799                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 30800                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 30801                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 30802                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30803                                  
 30804                                  ; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30805                                  
 30806                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 30807                                  ; (SYSINIT:3109h)
 30808                                  
 30809                                  GetXNum:
 30810                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, ds>
 30811                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30812                                  	;push	bx
 30813 00002BB3 51                      	push	cx ; *
 30814                                  	;push	ds
 30815                                  
 30816 00002BB4 FC                      	cld
 30817 00002BB5 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 30818 00002BB7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 30819 00002BB9 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 30820 00002BBB 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			; Start with 0 (makes sense)
 30821                                  
 30822 00002BBD 2EC706[7D2B]0A00        	mov	word [cs:gnradix],10	; And default to a radix of 10 (dec)
 30823                                  
 30824 00002BC4 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]		; Now AX=0, BX=0, CH=0/CL=char, DX=0
 30825                                  	;call	toDigit
 30826 00002BC7 E8D9FF                  	call	toDigit_dec
 30827                                  	;jc	short gxnE		; If it's not a digit, leave now.
 30828                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30829 00002BCA 7233                    	jc	short gxnX
 30830                                  
 30831 00002BCC 08C9                    	or	cl,cl
 30832 00002BCE 7517                    	jnz	short gxn20		; Doesn't have '0x'
 30833 00002BD0 268A4C01                	mov	cl,[es:si+1]
 30834 00002BD4 80F978                  	cmp	cl,'x'			; Either 'x'...
 30835 00002BD7 7405                    	je	short gxn10
 30836 00002BD9 80F958                  	cmp	cl,'X'			; ...or 'X' means it's hexadecimal
 30837 00002BDC 7509                    	jne	short gxn20
 30838                                  
 30839                                  gxn10:	
 30840 00002BDE 2EC706[7D2B]1000        	mov	word [cs:gnradix], 16
 30841 00002BE5 46                      	inc	si			; Since we read "0x", march over it.
 30842 00002BE6 46                      	inc	si
 30843                                  
 30844                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 30845                                  ; GXN20--ES:SI = a digit in a number; if not, we're done
 30846                                  ;        DX:AX = current total
 30847                                  ;        BX    = 0
 30848                                  ;        CH    = 0
 30849                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 30850                                  
 30851                                  gxn20:	
 30852 00002BE7 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]	; Now DX:AX=current total, CH=0/CL=char
 30853 00002BEA 46                      	inc	si
 30854                                  
 30855 00002BEB E891FF                  	call	toDigit		; Accepts only valid digits, A-F -> 10-16
 30856 00002BEE 720D                    	jc	short gxnQ	; <- Ah... wasn't a digit. Stop.
 30857                                  
 30858 00002BF0 E80E00                  	call	mul32		; Multiply DX:AX by gnradix
 30859 00002BF3 720A                    	jc	short gxnX	; (if it's too big, error out)
 30860                                  
 30861 00002BF5 01C8                    	add	ax,cx		; Add the digit
 30862 00002BF7 11DA                    	adc	dx,bx		; (BX is 0!)--Adds 1 if last add wrapped
 30863                                  	;jc	short gxnX	; If _that_ wrapped, it's too big.
 30864                                  	;jmp	short gxn20
 30865 00002BF9 73EC                    	jnc	short gxn20
 30866                                  gxnE:	
 30867                                  	;stc			; In this case, we need to set the carry
 30868 00002BFB EB02                    	jmp	short gxnX	; and leave--there were no digits given.
 30869                                  gxnQ:	
 30870 00002BFD 4E                      	dec	si		; Don't read in the offensive character.
 30871 00002BFE F8                      	clc			; And clear carry, so they know it's okay.
 30872                                  gxnX:	
 30873                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30874                                  	;pop	ds
 30875 00002BFF 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 30876                                  	;pop	bx
 30877 00002C00 C3                      	retn
 30878                                  
 30879                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30880                                  ;*** mul32 - multiplies the number in DX:AX by gnradix
 30881                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30882                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be multiplied, BX = 0, gnradix = multiplier
 30883                                  ; EXIT:    DX:AX has been multiplied by gnradix if carry clear; BX still 0
 30884                                  ; ERROR:   Carry set if number was too large
 30885                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 30886                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30887                                  
 30888                                  mul32:
 30889 00002C01 50                      	push	ax		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 30890 00002C02 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 30891 00002C04 2EF726[7D2B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=?, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 30892 00002C09 7211                    	jc	short m32E	; Too big?
 30893                                  
 30894 00002C0B 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 30895 00002C0D 58                      	pop	ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 30896                                  
 30897 00002C0E 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=0, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 30898 00002C10 2EF726[7D2B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=carry, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 30899 00002C15 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 30900 00002C17 01DA                    	add	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 30901 00002C19 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 30902 00002C1B C3                      	retn
 30903                                  m32E:	
 30904 00002C1C 58                      	pop	ax
 30905 00002C1D C3                      	retn
 30906                                  
 30907                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30908                                  ;*** toPara - divides DX:AX by 16; result in AX only (discards extra DX data)
 30909                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30910                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be divided
 30911                                  ; EXIT:    Interpereting DX:AX as bytes, AX=paragraph equivalent, 0xFFFF max
 30912                                  ; ERROR:   None
 30913                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 30914                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30915                                  ; Note: The 386 has a 32-bit SHR, which would work perfectly for this... but we
 30916                                  ;       can't ensure a 386 host machine. Sorry.
 30917                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30918                                  
 30919                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 30920                                  toPara:
 30921 00002C1E 51                      	push	cx		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:LLLL llll llll llll
 30922                                  
 30923 00002C1F B104                    	mov	cl,4		;
 30924 00002C21 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:0000 LLLL llll llll
 30925 00002C23 92                      	xchg	ax,dx		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh
 30926 00002C24 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 30927 00002C26 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:hhhh 0000 0000 0000
 30928 00002C28 09D0                    	or	ax,dx		;    AX=hhhh LLLL llll llll
 30929                                  
 30930 00002C2A 59                      	pop	cx
 30931 00002C2B C3                      	retn

 30933                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30934                                  ;*** UmbHead - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 30935                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30936                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 30937                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 30938                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 30939                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30940                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30941                                  ; Early in the boot-cycle, the pointer used to obtain this value isn't set up;
 30942                                  ; to be precise, before a UMB provider is around. In this event, the pointer
 30943                                  ; is always set to 0xFFFF; it changes once a provider is around. On most
 30944                                  ; machines (all of 'em I've seen), it changes to 0x9FFF at that point.
 30945                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30946                                  
 30947                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 30948                                  UmbHead:
 30949                                  	; 13/05/2019 (because of callers, pushs & pops are not needed here)
 30950                                  
 30951                                  	;push	si ; ?
 30952                                  	;push	ds ; ? 
 30953                                  	;push	es
 30954                                  	;push	bx ; *	
 30955                                  
 30956                                  	; 09/04/2019
 30957                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 30958                                  
 30959 00002C2C B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30960 00002C2E CD21                    	int	21h
 30961                                  
 30962 00002C30 26A18C00                	mov	ax,[es:DOS_UMB_HEAD]	; And read what's in ES:[008C]
 30963                                  	
 30964                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30965 00002C34 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30966 00002C37 F5                      	cmc
 30967                                  	; if AX=0FFFFh -> CF=1
 30968 00002C38 C3                      	retn
 30969                                  
 30970                                  ; 01/01/2023

 30972                                  ;	cmp	ax,0FFFFh

 30976                                  ;	;jmp	short uhX

 30978                                  ;	retn
 30979                                  ;uhE:	
 30980                                  ;	stc
 30981                                  ;uhX:

 30989                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30990                                  ;*** isSysMCB - sets ZF if ES points to an MCB owned by "SC" + (8 or 9)
 30991                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30992                                  ; ENTRY:  ES:0 should point to a valid MCB
 30993                                  ; EXIT:   ZF set if owned by SC+8 or SC+9 (for japan)
 30994                                  ; USES:   Flags
 30995                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 30997                                  isSysMCB:
 30998                                  	;push	ax
 30999                                  
 31000                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 31001                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 31002                                  	;je	short ism10

 31004                                  	;;je	short ism10
 31005                                  	;;jmp	short ismX		; Anything else isn't.
 31006                                  	;jne	short ismX
 31007 00002C39 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8  ; 09/04/2019
 31008 00002C3F 7507                    	jne	short ismX 
 31009                                  ism10:	
 31010                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]	; Check the name...
 31011                                  	;cmp	ax,'SC' ; 4353h

 31018                                  
 31019                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31020                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 31021                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31022                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 31023                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 31024                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 31025                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31026                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31027                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 31028                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 31029                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 31030                                  ;      ...
 31031                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 31032                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31033                                  
 31034                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31035                                  AddrToUmb:
 31036                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31037                                  	;push	cx
 31038                                  	;push	dx
 31039 00002C49 06                      	push	es
 31040                                  
 31041 00002C4A 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 31042                                  
 31043 00002C4C E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 31044 00002C4F 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 31045                                  
 31046                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31047                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 31048 00002C51 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 31049                                  
 31050                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31051                                  atu10:
 31052 00002C53 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 31053                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31054                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 31055                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 31056                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 31057                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31058                                  
 31059                                  ;atu10:	
 31060                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 31061 00002C55 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 31062 00002C57 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 31063                                  
 31064 00002C59 E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 31065 00002C5C 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 31066                                  
 31067 00002C5E 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 31068                                  atu20:	
 31069                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31070                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 31071                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31072                                  	; ax = es
 31073                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31074 00002C5F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31075 00002C64 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31076 00002C6A 7403                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31077                                  
 31078                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 31079                                  
 31080                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31081                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 31082                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31083 00002C6C 40                      	inc	ax
 31084                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31085                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 31086 00002C6D EBE4                    	jmp	short atu10
 31087                                  
 31088                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31089                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 31090                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 31091                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31092                                  
 31093                                  atu30:	
 31094                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31095                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 31096                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31097                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 31098 00002C6F 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 31099 00002C71 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 31100                                  atuE:	
 31101 00002C73 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 31102 00002C75 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 31103                                  atuX:	
 31104 00002C76 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 31105                                  	
 31106 00002C78 07                      	pop	es	
 31107                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31108                                  	;pop	dx
 31109                                  	;pop	cx
 31110 00002C79 C3                      	retn
 31111                                  
 31112                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31113                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 31114                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 31115                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 31116                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 31117                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31118                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 31119                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 31120                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31121                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31122                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31123                                  
 31124                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31125                                  convUMB:
 31126 00002C7A 2E833E[7D2B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 31127 00002C80 7507                    	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 31128 00002C82 E8C4FF                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 31129                                  	;cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31130                                  	;jne	short cu10
 31131                                  	;inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 31132                                  	; 01/01/2023

 31167                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31168                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 31169                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31170                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 31171                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 31172                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 31173                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31174                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 31175                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31176                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 31177                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0. That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 31178                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 31179                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 31180                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31181                                  
 31182                                  loadLow:
 31183                                  	;push	ds
 31184                                  	;push	cs		; Point DS into appropriate data segment
 31185                                  	;pop	ds	
 31186                                  
 31187                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 31188                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 31189                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh, -1
 31190                                  	jne	short ll10
 31191                                  
 31192                                  	stc
 31193                                  ll15:
 31194                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 31195                                  	;stc
 31196                                  	;jmp	short llX
 31197                                  	retn
 31198                                  ll10:	
 31199                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 31200                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 31201                                  
 31202                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31203                                  	retn
 31204                                  
 31205                                  	;mov	al,1
 31206                                  	;clc
 31207                                  ;llX:
 31208                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 31209                                  	;retn
 31210                                  
 31211                                  %endif

 31676                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 31677                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31678                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31679                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 31680                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 31681                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 31682                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31683                                  
 31684                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31685                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 31686                                  findUMB:
 31687                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31688                                  	;push	ax
 31689                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31690 00002D52 51                      	push	cx ; *
 31691                                  	;push	dx
 31692                                  
 31693 00002D53 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 31694                                  
 31695 00002D55 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 31696                                  
 31697 00002D57 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 31698                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31699                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 31700 00002D5A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 31701                                  
 31702                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31703                                  fu10:
 31704 00002D5C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 31705                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31706                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 31707                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 31708                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 31709                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31710                                  
 31711                                  ;fu10:	
 31712 00002D5E 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 31713 00002D60 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 31714                                  
 31715 00002D62 E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 31716 00002D65 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 31717                                  
 31718 00002D67 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31719                                  fu20:	
 31720                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31721                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31722                                  	; 19/07/2023
 31723 00002D68 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 31724 00002D6E 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31725                                  
 31726                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31727                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31728                                  	; ax = es
 31729                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 31730                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31731 00002D70 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31732 00002D75 40                      	inc	ax
 31733                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31734                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 31735 00002D76 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 31736                                  fuE:	
 31737 00002D78 F9                      	stc
 31738                                  fuX:
 31739                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31740                                  	;pop	dx
 31741                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31742 00002D79 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 31743                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 31744 00002D7A C3                      	retn
 31745                                  
 31746                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31747                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 31748                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31749                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31750                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 31751                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 31752                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 31753                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31754                                  
 31755                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31756                                  BigFree:
 31757                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31758                                  	;push	bx
 31759 00002D7B 51                      	push	cx
 31760                                  
 31761 00002D7C E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 31762 00002D7F 723A                    	jc	short bfX
 31763                                  
 31764 00002D81 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 31765 00002D83 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 31766                                  
 31767                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31768                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31769                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 31770                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 31771                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31772                                  
 31773                                  bf10:	
 31774 00002D85 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 31775 00002D88 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 31776                                  
 31777                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31778 00002D8A 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31779 00002D90 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 31780                                  
 31781 00002D92 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31782                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 31783 00002D96 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 31784                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 31785                                  	; 19/07/2023
 31786 00002D98 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 31787                                  
 31788 00002D9A 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 31789                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 31790 00002D9C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 31791                                  bf20:	
 31792                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31793                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 31794                                  	; 19/07/2023
 31795                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 31796 00002D9E 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31797 00002DA4 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 31798                                  
 31799                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 31800 00002DA6 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 31801                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31802 00002DA8 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31803 00002DAD 40                      	inc     ax
 31804 00002DAE 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 31805                                  
 31806 00002DB0 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 31807                                  
 31808 00002DB2 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 31809 00002DB4 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 31810 00002DB6 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31811 00002DB8 7501                    	jnz	short bfX
 31812                                  bfE:	
 31813 00002DBA F9                      	stc				; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 31814                                  bfX:
 31815 00002DBB 59                      	pop	cx
 31816                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31817                                  	;pop	bx
 31818 00002DBC C3                      	retn
 31819                                  
 31820                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31821                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 31822                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31823                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31824                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 31825                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31826                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31827                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31828                                  
 31829                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31830                                  
 31831                                  isSpecified:
 31832                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31833                                  	;push	ax
 31834                                  
 31835 00002DBD 30FF                    	xor	bh,bh
 31836 00002DBF 88C3                    	mov	bl,al
 31837                                  
 31838                                  	;getdata al,DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 31839                                  	;
 31840                                  	;push	ds
 31841                                  	;push	cs
 31842                                  	;pop	ds
 31843                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 31844                                  	;pop	ds
 31845                                  	
 31846                                  	;mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 31847                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31848                                  	; ds = cs
 31849 00002DC1 8A87[2A1F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 31850                                  
 31851 00002DC5 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 31852                                  
 31853                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31854                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31855                                  	;pop	ax
 31856                                  
 31857 00002DC7 C3                      	retn
 31858                                  
 31859                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31860                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 31861                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31862                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 31863                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 31864                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 31865                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31866                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31867                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 31868                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 31869                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 31870                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 31871                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 31872                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31873                                  
 31874                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ 20h
 31875                                  
 31876                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31877                                  
 31878                                  shrinkMCB:
 31879                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 31880                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31881                                  	;push	bx
 31882 00002DC8 51                      	push	cx
 31883 00002DC9 06                      	push	es
 31884                                  
 31885 00002DCA 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 31886                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31887                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 31888                                  
 31889 00002DCC 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31890                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31891 00002DD1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 31892                                  
 31893 00002DD3 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 31894                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 31895                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 31896                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 31897                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31898                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 31899                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31900 00002DD6 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 31901 00002DD8 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 31902                                  
 31903 00002DDA 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31904                                  	
 31905                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31906                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31907 00002DDF 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 31908                                  
 31909 00002DE1 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 31910 00002DE6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 31911                                  
 31912 00002DEC 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 31913 00002DEE 40                      	inc	ax
 31914 00002DEF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 31915                                  
 31916 00002DF1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 31917 00002DF3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 31918                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31919                                  	; ax > 0
 31920 00002DF5 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 31921                                  
 31922                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31923 00002DF6 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 31924                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 31925 00002DFB 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 31926                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31927                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 31928                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 31929                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 31930                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 31931                                  
 31932                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31933 00002DFF E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 31934                                  
 31935                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31936                                  	; cf=0
 31937                                  	;clc
 31938                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31939                                  	;jmp	short smX
 31940                                  smE:	
 31941                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31942                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 31943                                  	;stc
 31944                                  smX:	
 31945                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 31946 00002E02 07                      	pop	es
 31947 00002E03 59                      	pop	cx
 31948                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31949                                  	;pop	bx
 31950 00002E04 C3                      	retn
 31951                                  
 31952                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31953                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 31954                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31955                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 31956                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 31957                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31958                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 31959                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31960                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 31961                                  ;
 31962                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 31963                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 31964                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 31965                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 31966                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 31967                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 31968                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 31969                                  ;       Endif
 31970                                  ;    Endif
 31971                                  ; Endif
 31972                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 31973                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 31974                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 31975                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 31976                                  ;    ENDIF
 31977                                  ; ENDIF
 31978                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31979                                  
 31980                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31981                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 31982                                  _hideUMB_:
 31983                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31984                                  	; ds = cs
 31985                                  
 31986                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31987                                  	;push	bx
 31988                                  	;push	dx
 31989 00002E05 06                      	push	es
 31990                                  
 31991 00002E06 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 31992 00002E08 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 31993 00002E0B 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 31994                                  
 31995 00002E0D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 31996 00002E0F E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 31997 00002E12 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 31998                                  
 31999 00002E14 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 32000 00002E15 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 32001 00002E17 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 32002 00002E1A 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 32003                                  
 32004 00002E1B 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 32005 00002E1D 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 32006                                  
 32007 00002E1F 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 32008 00002E21 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 32009                                  
 32010 00002E23 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 32011 00002E25 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 32012 00002E28 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 32013                                  hu_10:	
 32014                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 32015                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 32016                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32017                                  ;isTiny:
 32018                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 32019                                  	;or	al,al
 32020 00002E2A 800E[261F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 32021 00002E2F 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 32022                                  
 32023 00002E31 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 32024 00002E34 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 32025                                  
 32026 00002E36 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 32027 00002E38 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 32028                                  
 32029 00002E3A 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 32030 00002E3C E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 32031 00002E3F 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 32032                                  
 32033 00002E41 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32034                                  hu_30:	
 32035 00002E43 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32036                                  
 32037 00002E45 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 32038                                  
 32039 00002E48 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 32040 00002E4A 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 32041                                  
 32042 00002E4C 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 32043 00002E4E E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 32044                                  hu_X:	
 32045 00002E51 07                      	pop	es
 32046                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32047                                  	;pop	dx
 32048                                  	;pop	bx
 32049 00002E52 C3                      	retn
 32050                                  
 32051                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32052                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 32053                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32054                                  ; Entry:  None
 32055                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 32056                                  ; Error:  None
 32057                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 32058                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32059                                  
 32060                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32061                                  UnFreeze:
 32062                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32063                                  	;push	ax
 32064 00002E53 06                      	push	es
 32065                                  
 32066 00002E54 E8D5FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 32067 00002E57 721C                    	jc	short ufX
 32068                                  
 32069                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32070                                  uf10:
 32071 00002E59 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 32072                                  
 32073                                  ; ------------------------------
 32074                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32075                                  ; ------------------------------
 32076                                  
 32077                                  ;uf10:	
 32078 00002E5B E81900                  	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 32079 00002E5E 7505                    	jnz	short uf20
 32080 00002E60 E8D4FE                  	call	unHideMCB
 32081                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32082                                  	; ax <> es
 32083 00002E63 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es ; *
 32084                                  uf20:	
 32085                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32086                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32087                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32088 00002E65 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32089 00002E6B 7408                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.. that's it.
 32090                                  
 32091                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32092                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32093                                  	; ax = es
 32094                                  	;mov	ax,es ; *
 32095                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32096 00002E6D 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32097 00002E72 40                      	inc	ax
 32098                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32099                                  	;mov	es,ax
 32100 00002E73 EBE4                    	jmp	short uf10
 32101                                  ufX:	
 32102 00002E75 07                      	pop	es
 32103                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32104                                  	;pop	ax
 32105 00002E76 C3                      	retn
 32106                                  
 32107                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32108                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 32109                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32110                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32111                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 32112                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32113                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32114                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32115                                  
 32116                                  isFrozMCB:
 32117                                  	;push	ax
 32118                                  
 32119                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 32120                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 32121 00002E77 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 32122 00002E7D 7522                    	jne	short ifmX
 32123                                  
 32124                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 32125                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 32126 00002E7F 26813E08004652          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 32127 00002E86 7519                    	jne	short ifmX
 32128                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 32129                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 32130 00002E88 26813E0A004F5A          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 32131 00002E8F 7510                    	jne	short ifmX
 32132                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 32133                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 32134 00002E91 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32135 00002E98 7507                    	jne	short ifmX
 32136                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 32137                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32138 00002E9A 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32139                                  ifmX:	
 32140                                  	;pop	ax
 32141 00002EA1 C3                      	retn
 32142                                  
 32143                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32144                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 32145                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32146                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32147                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 32148                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32149                                  ; USES:     None

 32151                                  
 32152                                  frezMCB:
 32153 00002EA2 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 32154 00002EA9 26C70608004652          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 32155 00002EB0 26C7060A004F5A          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 32156 00002EB7 26C7060C00454E          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32157 00002EBE 26C7060E002020          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32158 00002EC5 C3                      	retn
 32159                                  
 32160                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32161                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 32162                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32163                                  ; Entry:  None

 32165                                  ; Error:  None

 32652                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32653                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 32654                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32655                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32656                                  
 32657                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32658                                  ;
 32659                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 32660                                  ;
 32661                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 32662                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 32663                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 32664                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 32665                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 32666                                  ;
 32667                                  ;	Output : none
 32668                                  ;
 32669                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 32670                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 32671                                  ;
 32672                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32673                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 32674                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 32675                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 32676                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 32677                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32678                                  
 32679                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32680                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32681                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 32682                                  InitDevLoad:
 32683                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32684                                  	;push	es ; *
 32685                                  
 32686                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32687                                  	; ds = cs
 32688 00002FE4 803E[7B1F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 32689                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 32690                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 32691 00002FE9 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 32692                                  
 32693                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32694                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32695                                  ; %if 0
 32696                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32697 00002FEB 803E[6B1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1
 32698                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 32699 00002FF0 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 32700                                  
 32701                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 32702                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 32703                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 32704                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 32705                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 32706                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 32707                                  
 32708 00002FF2 E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 32709                                  
 32710 00002FF5 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 32711 00002FF8 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 32712 00002FFB E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 32713 00002FFE 9C                      	pushf
 32714 00002FFF E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 32715 00003002 9D                      	popf
 32716                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 32717                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 32718                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 32719 00003003 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 32720                                  
 32721                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 32722                                  
 32723                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32724                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 32725                                  InitForConv:
 32726                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32727                                  	; ds = cs
 32728 00003005 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 32729                                  					;  current UMB ?
 32730 00003008 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 32731 0000300A E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 32732 0000300D E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 32733                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 32734 00003010 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 32735                                  					;  in low memory
 32736                                  InitForHi:
 32737                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32738                                  	; ds = cs
 32739                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 32740                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 32741                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 32742 00003012 A1[711F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 32743 00003015 8B16[6D1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32744 00003019 0316[6F1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 32745 0000301D EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 32746                                  
 32747                                  InitForLo:
 32748                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32749                                  	; ds = cs
 32750                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 32751 0000301F C606[7B1F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 32752                                  initforlo_x:
 32753                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32754                                  	; ds = cs
 32755                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 32756                                  					;  we are loading low
 32757                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = Start of Low memory
 32758                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 32759 00003024 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 32760 00003027 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 32761                                  idl1:
 32762 0000302B E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 32763                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32764                                  	; ds = cs
 32765                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 32766                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 32767                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 32768                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 32769 0000302E A3[5F1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 32770 00003031 8916[611F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 32771 00003035 C706[631F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 32772 0000303B A3[651F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 32773                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32774                                  	;pop	es ; *
 32775 0000303E C3                      	retn
 32776                                  
 32777                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32778                                  ;
 32779                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 32780                                  ;
 32781                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 32782                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 32783                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 32784                                  ;		   current UMB
 32785                                  ;
 32786                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32787                                  
 32788                                  SpaceInUMB:
 32789                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32790                                  	; ds = cs
 32791                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 32792                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 32793                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 32794 0000303F A1[6F1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 32795 00003042 0306[6D1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 32796 00003046 2B06[711F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 32797                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32798                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 32799                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 32800                                  	;stc
 32801                                  	;retn
 32802                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32803 0000304A 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 32804 0000304D 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 32805                                  spcinumb1:
 32806 0000304F 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 32807                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32808                                  	; ds = cs
 32809 00003050 3B06[5D1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 32810                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 32811                                  spcinumb2:
 32812 00003054 C3                      	retn
