 32814                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32815                                  ;
 32816                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 32817                                  ;
 32818                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 32819                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 32820                                  ;
 32821                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32822                                  
 32823                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32824                                  ;
 32825                                  ;PrepareMark:
 32826                                  ;	push	ds
 32827                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 32828                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32829                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32830                                  ;	pop	ds
 32831                                  ;
 32832                                  ;	inc	ax
 32833                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32834                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32835                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32836                                  ;	retn
 32837                                  
 32838                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32839                                  ;
 32840                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 32841                                  ;
 32842                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 32843                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 32844                                  ;		 the device.
 32845                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 32846                                  ;
 32847                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 32848                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 32849                                  ;	UMB.
 32850                                  ;
 32851                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 32852                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 32853                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 32854                                  ;
 32855                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32856                                  
 32857                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32858                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 32859                                  
 32860                                  GetUMBForDev:
 32861                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32862                                  	; ds = cs
 32863 00003055 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 32864 00003058 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32865 0000305B CD21                    	int	21h
 32866                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 32867                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 32868                                  
 32869 0000305D 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32870                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 32871                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32872 0000305F 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 32873                                  
 32874 00003061 4B                      	dec	bx
 32875                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32876                                  	; ds = cs
 32877 00003062 391E[5D1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 32878                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 32879 00003066 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 32880                                  
 32881 00003068 43                      	inc	bx
 32882                                  
 32883 00003069 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32884 0000306C CD21                    	int	21h
 32885 0000306E 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 32886                                  
 32887                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32888                                  	;dec	ax
 32889                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 32890                                  	;
 32891                                  PrepareMark:
 32892 00003070 1E                      	push	ds
 32893 00003071 48                      	dec	ax
 32894 00003072 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32895 00003074 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32896 0000307A C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32897 00003080 40                      	inc	ax
 32898 00003081 1F                      	pop	ds
 32899                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32900                                  	; ds = cs
 32901                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32902                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32903                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32904                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 32905 00003082 891E[6F1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 32906 00003086 A3[6D1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32907 00003089 A3[711F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32908                                  	;
 32909                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32910                                  	; cf=0
 32911                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 32912 0000308C C3                      	retn
 32913                                  
 32914                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 32915                                  %if 1
 32916                                  gufd_err:
 32917 0000308D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 32918                                  gufd_error:
 32919 0000308F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 32920 00003091 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 32921 00003092 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 32922                                  %endif
 32923                                  
 32924                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 32925                                  %if 0
 32926                                  gufd_err:
 32927                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 32928                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32929                                  	; ds = cs
 32930                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 32931                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32932                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32933                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 32934                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32935                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32936                                  	stc
 32937                                  	retn
 32938                                  %endif

 32941                                  ;
 32942                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 32943                                  ;
 32944                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 32945                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 32946                                  ;
 32947                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 32948                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 32949                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 32950                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 32951                                  ;
 32952                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 32953                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 32954                                  ;
 32955                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32956                                  
 32957                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32958                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 32959                                  
 32960                                  DevSetMark:
 32961 00003094 06                      	push	es
 32962                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32963                                  	;push	di
 32964 00003095 1E                      	push	ds
 32965 00003096 56                      	push	si
 32966 00003097 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32967 00003099 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 32968 0000309F 40                      	inc	ax
 32969 000030A0 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 32970                                  
 32971                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 32972                                  
 32973 000030A4 50                      	push	ax			; save load address
 32974                                  	
 32975                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32976                                  	; ds = cs
 32977                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 32978 000030A5 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 32979                                  
 32980 000030A9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32981 000030AB FC                      	cld
 32982                                  dsm_again:
 32983 000030AC AC                      	lodsb
 32984 000030AD 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32985 000030AF 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 32986 000030B1 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32987 000030B3 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32988                                  isit_slash:
 32989 000030B5 3C5C                    	cmp	al,'\'
 32990 000030B7 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 32991 000030B9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32992 000030BB EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32993                                  isit_null:
 32994 000030BD 08C0                    	or	al,al
 32995 000030BF 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 32996 000030C1 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 32997                                  
 32998 000030C3 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 32999 000030C6 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 33000                                  dsm_next_char:
 33001 000030C9 AC                      	lodsb
 33002 000030CA 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33003 000030CC 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 33004 000030CE 3C2E                    	cmp	al,'.'
 33005 000030D0 7403                    	je	short blankout
 33006 000030D2 AA                      	stosb
 33007 000030D3 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 33008                                  blankout:
 33009 000030D5 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 33010 000030D7 B020                    	mov	al,' '
 33011 000030D9 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 33012                                  dsm_exit:
 33013 000030DB 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load address
 33014 000030DC 5E                      	pop	si
 33015 000030DD 1F                      	pop	ds
 33016                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33017                                  	;pop	di
 33018 000030DE 07                      	pop	es
 33019 000030DF C3                      	retn

 33022                                  ;
 33023                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 33024                                  ;
 33025                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 33026                                  ;
 33027                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 33028                                  ;
 33029                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 33030                                  ;	in DevSize
 33031                                  ;
 33032                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33033                                  
 33034                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33035                                  SizeDevice:
 33036                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33037                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *

 33039 000030E1 06                      	push	es
 33040 000030E2 1F                      	pop	ds

 33042 000030E5 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 33043 000030E8 CD21                    	int	21h
 33044 000030EA 7237                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 33045                                  
 33046 000030EC 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 33047 000030EE B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 33048 000030F1 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx

 33050 000030F5 CD21                    	int	21h

 33052 000030F9 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 33053 000030FC 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33054 000030FF F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffffh paras ?
 33055                                  	;jz	short szdev1		; no
 33056                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33057 00003103 7409                    	jz	short sd_ctp
 33058 00003105 2EC706[5D1F]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 33059                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 33060 0000310C EB0E                    	jmp	short sd_close
 33061                                  sd_ctp:	
 33062                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33063                                  ;szdev1:
 33064 0000310E B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 33065 00003110 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 33066 00003112 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 33067 00003114 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 33068 00003116 09D0                    	or	ax,dx ; * ; cf=0
 33069                                  	;
 33070                                  	; 22/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimized)
 33071                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:37A6h 
 33072                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33073                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 33074                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 33075                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 33076                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33077                                  	;clc
 33078                                  ;szdev2:
 33079 00003118 2EA3[5D1F]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size (in paragraps)
 33080                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33081                                  	;clc ; cf=0 ; *	; CLC is not needed here
 33082                                  			; (OR instruction clears CF) - E.TAN 22/07/2023
 33083                                  
 33084                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33085                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33086                                  	; cf=0
 33087                                  	;clc
 33088                                  sd_close:
 33089 0000311C 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 33090                                  					;  carry flag

 33102                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 33103                                  ;
 33104                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 33105                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 33106                                  ;
 33107                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 33108                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 33109                                  ;

 33115                                  ExecDev:

 33118                                  					;  block for exec with

 33175                                  ; procedure : RemoveNull

 33473                                  ;
 33474                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33475                                  ;
 33476                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33477                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33478                                  ;
 33479                                  ;	Returns in AX the number of paras equivalent to the
 33480                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33481                                  ;
 33482                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 33483                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 33484                                  ;
 33485                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33486                                  
 33487                                  ; 13/05/2019
 33488                                  
 33489                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33490                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 33491                                  
 33492                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33493                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 33494                                  GetHexNum:
 33495 00003218 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 33496 0000321A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33497                                  ghn_next:
 33498 0000321C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 33499 0000321F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 33500 00003222 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 33501 00003224 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 33502 00003227 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 33503 00003229 50                      	push	ax
 33504 0000322A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 33505 0000322C E8D80F                  	call	delim
 33506 0000322F 58                      	pop	ax
 33507                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33508 00003230 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 33509 00003233 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 33510 00003235 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 33511                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 33512                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33513 00003238 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 33514                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33515                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33516                                  ghn_shift1:
 33517 0000323A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 33518 0000323C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 33519 0000323E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 33520 00003240 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 33521 00003242 46                      	inc	si
 33522 00003243 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 33523                                  ghn_into_paras:
 33524 00003245 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 33525 00003248 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33526 0000324B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 33527 0000324F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 33528                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33529                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33530                                  ghn_shift2:
 33531 00003251 F8                      	clc
 33532 00003252 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 33533 00003254 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 33534 00003256 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 33535 00003258 F8                      	clc
 33536 00003259 C3                      	retn
 33537                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33538                                  ghn_err:
 33539                                  gnib_err:
 33540 0000325A F9                      	stc
 33541                                  ghn_ret:
 33542                                  gnib_ret:
 33543 0000325B C3                      	retn

 33547                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 33548                                  ;
 33549                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 33550                                  ;
 33551                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 33552                                  ;
 33553                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 33554                                  ;
 33555                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33556                                  
 33557                                  GetNibble:
 33558 0000325C 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 33559                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 33560                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33561 0000325F 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 33562 00003261 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 33563 00003264 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 33564 00003266 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 33565 00003269 C3                      	retn
 33566                                  is_it_hex:
 33567 0000326A 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 33568                                  	;jb	short gnib_err

 33571 0000326F 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 33572 00003272 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 33573 00003274 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 33574 00003277 C3                      	retn

 33595                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33596                                  ;
 33597                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 33598                                  ;
 33599                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 33600                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 33601                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 33602                                  ;			; DS = data
 33603                                  ;
 33604                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 33605                                  ;
 33606                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 33607                                  ;
 33608                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33609                                  
 33610                                  umb_insert:
 33611 00003278 1E                      	push	ds
 33612                                  
 33613                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33614                                  	; ds = cs
 33615                                  
 33616                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33617 00003279 8E1E[8A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 33618                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 33619 0000327D 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 33620 00003281 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 33621 00003283 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33622                                  ui_next:
 33623 00003285 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 33624                                  					;    new block
 33625 00003287 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 33626                                  					; Q: is current block the
 33627                                  					;    last
 33628 00003289 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33629 0000328F 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 33630                                  					; N: get next block
 33631 00003291 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 33632                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 33633 00003293 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33634 00003296 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 33635                                  
 33636                                  ui_insert:
 33637 00003298 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 33638 0000329A 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 33639                                  
 33640 0000329B 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 33641 0000329D F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 33642                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 33643 0000329F C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33644                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 33645 000032A4 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33646                                  	;mov	[3],cx

 33648                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 33649 000032AE C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33650                                  
 33651                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33652                                  
 33653 000032B4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33654 000032B6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33655 000032BC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 33656                                  					; mark as free
 33657 000032C3 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 33658                                  					; start & end of new block
 33659 000032C6 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 33660                                  
 33661                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 33662                                  	
 33663 000032CB 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 33664 000032CD 43                      	inc	bx
 33665 000032CE 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 33666 000032D0 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 33667                                  
 33668                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 33669                                  					; this block
 33670 000032D1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 33671                                  	
 33672 000032D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33673 000032D9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33674 000032E0 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33675 000032E4 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33676                                  
 33677 000032EB EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 33678                                  
 33679                                  ui_append:
 33680                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 33681 000032ED 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 33682 000032F2 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 33683                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 33684                                  					; block for the next arena.
 33685                                  	; 13/05/2019
 33686 000032F8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33687                                  
 33688 000032FE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 33689 00003300 40                      	inc	ax
 33690 00003301 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 33691                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 33692 00003303 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33693                                  
 33694 00003305 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 33695                                  
 33696 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33697 0000330D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33698 00003314 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33699 00003318 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 33700                                  
 33701                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33702 0000331F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33703 00003321 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 33704 00003327 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 33705                                  					; mark as free
 33706 0000332E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33707 0000332F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33708                                  ui_done:
 33709                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 33710 00003334 1F                      	pop	ds
 33711                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33712                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 33713                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 33714 00003335 C3                      	retn

 33740                                  ;	retn
 33741                                  
 33742                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33743                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 33744                                  
 33745                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33746                                  
 33747                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33748                                  
 33749                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33750                                  ;
 33751                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 33752                                  ;
 33753                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 33754                                  ;	if it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 33755                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 33756                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 33757                                  ;
 33758                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 33759                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 33760                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 33761                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 33762                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 33763                                  ;
 33764                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33765                                  
 33766                                  umb_coalesce:
 33767                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33768                                  	; ds = cs
 33769 00003345 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 33770                                  
 33771 00003346 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 33772                                  
 33773                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33774                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33775 00003348 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33776 0000334C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 33777                                  uc_nextfree:
 33778 00003351 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33779 00003353 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33780                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 33781 00003355 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 33782 0000335A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 33783                                  					; N: get next arena
 33784 0000335C E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 33785 0000335F 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33786 00003361 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 33787                                  uc_again:
 33788 00003363 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 33789 00003366 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33790                                  uc_check:
 33791 00003368 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 33792 0000336D 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 33793                                  					; Y: coalesce
 33794 0000336F 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 33795 00003374 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 33796                                  	;add	[3],cx
 33797 00003375 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 33798 00003379 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 33799 0000337C 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 33800 0000337E EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 33801                                  
 33802                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33803                                  ;uc_done:
 33804                                  	;retn

 33856                                  ;

 33858                                  ;
 33859                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 33860                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 33861                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 33862                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 33863                                  ;				NC
 33864                                  ;			  else 
 33865                                  ;				CY
 33866                                  ;
 33867                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 33868                                  ;

 33872                                  	; 31/12/2022

 33877                                  					;   possible
 33878                                  	; 31/12/2022

 33880                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 33881                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 33882                                  					; the largest UMB

 33885

 33887

 33895 000033C5 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 33896                                  ua_err:

 33898                                  
 33899                                  	;clc
 33900                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33901                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33902                                  	; cf=0
 33903                                  	;clc 
 33904                                  ua_done:
 33905 000033C8 58                      	pop	ax
 33906 000033C9 C3                      	retn
 33907                                  	; 27/07/2023

 33925 000033CF 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 33926                                  _get_next_:

 33928 000033D3 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length

 33930 000033D8 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax

 33944                                  ;
 33945                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 33946                                  ;
 33947                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33948

 33950                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 33951                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 33952                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33953                                  	; ds = cs

 33955 000033E0 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33956                                  
 33957                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 33958                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 33959                                  
 33960                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33961                                  	; ds = cs
 33962                                  
 33963 000033E2 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 33964 000033E4 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 33965 000033E6 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 33966                                  
 33967 000033E8 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 33968 000033EA 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 33969                                  
 33970 000033EC F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33971                                  
 33972                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 33973                                  	; 09/09/2023

 33975 000033EF 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 33976                                  	
 33977 000033F1 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33978 000033F7 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33979

 33981 00003402 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33982

 33987 00003411 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 33988                                  					; mark as free 
 33989 00003418 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33990 00003419 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx

 33993                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33994 0000341E 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 33995                                  	; 18/09/2023

 33997                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 33998                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 33999                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 34000                                  					;  just below Top of Mem

 34003

 34008 0000342C 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 34009                                  ;scan_next

 34011                                  scannext:
 34012 0000342E 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 34013 00003432 740C                    	je	short got_last
 34014

 34016 00003436 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34017 0000343B 40                      	inc	ax
 34018 0000343C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34019                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 34020                                  	; 09/12/2022
 34021 0000343E EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 34022                                  got_last:
 34023                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 34024                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34025 00003440 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34026                                  
 34027 00003445 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34028                                  	;clc
 34029                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34030                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34031                                  	; cf=0
 34032                                  	;clc
 34033 0000344B C3                      	retn
 34034                                  
 34035                                  ; 11/12/2022
 34036                                  ;;lfu_err:

 34045                                  ;
 34046                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 34047                                  ;
 34048                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 34049                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 34050                                  ;
 34051                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34052                                  
 34053                                  ShrinkUMB:
 34054                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34055                                  	; ds = cs
 34056 0000344C 833E[6D1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 34057                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 34058 00003451 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 34059 00003453 06                      	push	es
 34060                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34061                                  	;push	bx
 34062                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34063                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 34064                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34065                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34066 00003454 8B1E[711F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 34067 00003458 2B1E[6D1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34068 0000345C 8E06[6D1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 34069                                  	
 34070 00003460 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 34071 00003463 CD21                    	int	21h
 34072                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34073                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34074                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 34075 00003465 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34076 00003467 48                      	dec	ax
 34077 00003468 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34078 0000346A 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 34079                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34080                                  	;pop	bx
 34081 00003471 07                      	pop	es
 34082                                  su_exit:
 34083 00003472 C3                      	retn

 34096 00003473 1E                      	push	ds

 34100                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 34101 0000347A 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 34102                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34103 0000347C 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34104                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34105 00003480 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34106 00003485 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34107                                  ulu_next:
 34108 0000348A E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 34109 0000348D 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 34110 0000348F 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 34111 00003491 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 34112 00003493 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34113 00003495 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 34114                                  ulu_found:
 34115                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 34116 00003497 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34117                                  ulu_x:
 34118 0000349C 07                      	pop	es
 34119 0000349D 1F                      	pop	ds
 34120 0000349E C3                      	retn

 34122                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34123                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34124                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34125                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34126                                  
 34127                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34128                                  ;
 34129                                  ; Summary:
 34130                                  ;
 34131                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34132                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34133                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34134                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34135                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34136                                  ;
 34137                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34138                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34139                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34140                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34141                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34142                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34143                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34144                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34145                                  ;
 34146                                  ; Example:
 34147                                  ;
 34148                                  ;   [menu]
 34149                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34150                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34151                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34152                                  ;
 34153                                  ;   [network]
 34154                                  ;   include misc
 34155                                  ;   device=foo
 34156                                  ;
 34157                                  ;   [misc]
 34158                                  ;   device=bar
 34159                                  ;   include alternate
 34160                                  ;
 34161                                  ;   [alternate]
 34162                                  ;   device=tar
 34163                                  ;
 34164                                  ;
 34165                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34166                                  ;
 34167                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34168                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34169                                  ;
 34170                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34171                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34172                                  ;   following order:
 34173                                  ;
 34174                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34175                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34176                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34177                                  ;
 34178                                  
 34179                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34180                                  
 34181                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34182                                  
 34183                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34184                                  
 34185                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34186                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34187                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34188                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34189                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34190                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34191                                  
 34192                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34193                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34194                                  
 34195                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34196                                  
 34197                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34198                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34199                                  
 34200 0000349F 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 34201                                  
 34202                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34203                                  ;
 34204                                  ; procedure : setparms
 34205                                  ;
 34206                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 34207                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 34208                                  ;
 34209                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34210

 34346

 34350                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34351                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 34352                                  
 34353                                  	;push	ds ; *
 34354                                  
 34355                                  	;push	cs ; *
 34356                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 34357                                  
 34358                                  nextswtch:
 34359                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 34360                                  	je	short done_line
 34361                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 34362                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 34363                                  
 34364                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 34365

 34367                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 34368                                  	cmp	al,'/'

 34371                                  	;jmp	short exitpl

 34426                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34427                                  ;
 34428                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34429                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 34430                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 34431                                  ; error.

 34442                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 34443 00003504 C3                      	retn

 34524                                  ; procedure : process_num
 34525                                  ;
 34526                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 34527                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 34528                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 34529                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 34530                                  ;
 34531                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 34541 00003559 7404                    	jz	short try_f

 34548                                  try_f:

 34550 0000355F F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 34551                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 34552 00003562 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 34553                                  
 34554                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 34555                                  
 34556                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 34557 00003564 A2[3448]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 34558                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34559                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 34560                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34561                                  	; cf=0
 34562 00003567 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 34563                                  try_t:
 34564 00003568 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 34565 0000356A 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 34566                                  	; 12/12/2022

 34568                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 34569 0000356F 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 34570

 34572 00003571 A3[3748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax
 34573                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34574                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 34575                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34576                                  	; cf=0

 34578                                  try_s:
 34579                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34580 00003575 F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h

 34582 00003578 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 34583 0000357A A3[5949]                	mov	[slim],ax

 34700                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34701                                  ;
 34702                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 34703                                  ;
 34704                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 34705                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 34706                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 34707                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 34708                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 34709                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 34710                                  ;
 34711                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 34712                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 34713                                  ;
 34714                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 34715                                  ;
 34716                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34717                                  
 34718                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34719                                  
 34720                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34721                                  
 34722                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34723                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 34724

 34801                                  	; ax = 2

 34805                                  
 34806 00003614 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 34807                                  
 34808                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 34809                                  
 34810 00003616 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 34811                                  
 34812                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 34813                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 34814                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 34815                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 34816                                  
 34817                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 34818                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 34819                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 34820                                  
 34821 00003618 833E[4748]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 34822 0000361D 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 34823 0000361F 833E[3748]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 34824 00003624 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 34825                                  
 34826                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 34827                                  
 34828 00003626 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34829                                  
 34830                                  ;	check for 320K
 34831                                  
 34832                                  not_144m:
 34833 00003628 833E[3748]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 34834 0000362D 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid
 34835 0000362F 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34836 00003634 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid
 34837

 34839 00003638 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediaid
 34840                                  
 34841                                  only_one_head:
 34842                                  
 34843                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 34844                                  
 34845 0000363A 803E[3448]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 34846 0000363F 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34847                                  
 34848                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 34849                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 34850                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 34851                                  
 34852 00003641 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 34853 00003643 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34854                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34855 00003648 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 34856                                  
 34857 0000364A B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 34858                                  
 34859                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 34860                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 34861                                  
 34862                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 34863                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34864                                  	; ax = 2
 34865 0000364C 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 34866 0000364D A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 34867                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 34868                                  
 34869                                  got_correct_mediaid:
 34870 00003650 881E[4448]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl

 35426                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35427                                  ;
 35428                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 35429                                  ;
 35430                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 35431                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 35432                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 35433                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 35434                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 35435                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 35436                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 35437                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 35438                                  ;
 35439                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35440                                  
 35441                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35442                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 35443                                  
 35444                                  skip_comment:
 35445 0000386C E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 35446                                  
 35447                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35448                                  	; ds = cs	
 35449                                  
 35450 0000386E 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 35451                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 35452 00003873 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 35453                                  
 35454 00003875 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 35455                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 35456 0000387A 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 35457                                  
 35458 0000387C 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35459                                  	
 35460 0000387F 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 35461                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 35462 00003883 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 35463                                  
 35464 00003885 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 35465                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 35466 0000388A 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35467                                  
 35468 0000388C 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 35469                                  	
 35470 00003890 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 35471                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 35472 00003894 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 35473                                  skip_cmmt:
 35474 00003896 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 35475 00003898 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35476 0000389B 46                      	inc	si
 35477 0000389C 49                      	dec	cx
 35478 0000389D 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 35479 0000389F 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35480                                  no_commt:
 35481 000038A1 C3                      	retn

 35491                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35492                                  ;
 35493                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 35494                                  ;
 35495                                  ;   INPUT
 35496                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35497                                  ;
 35498                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35499                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 35500                                  ;
 35501                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35502                                  ;       All
 35503                                  ;
 35504                                  ;   HISTORY
 35505                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35506                                  ;
 35507                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35508                                  
 35509                                  kbd_read:
 35510 000038A2 F606[FF46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 35511 000038A7 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 35512                                  
 35513 000038A9 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 35514 000038AA 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 35515 000038AC 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 35516                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 35517                                  kbd_loop:
 35518 000038AE B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 35519 000038B0 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 35520 000038B2 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 35521 000038B4 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35522 000038B6 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35523 000038B8 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35524 000038BA 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 35525 000038BC A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 35526                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 35527                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35528 000038BF 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 35529                                  
 35530 000038C4 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 35531 000038C6 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 35532                                  kbd_loopdone:
 35533 000038C8 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 35534                                  kbd_nodelay:
 35535 000038C9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 35536 000038CB B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35537 000038CD CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35538 000038CF A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35539 000038D1 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 35540 000038D3 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 35541 000038D4 43                              inc     bx
 35542                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 35543 000038D5 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35544                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 35545 000038DA B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 35546 000038DC CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35547 000038DE 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 35548 000038E0 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 35549 000038E2 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 35550                                  
 35551                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 35552 000038E4 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 35553 000038E7 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 35554                                  	
 35555 000038E9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35556 000038EC 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 35557                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 35558 000038EE BA[974B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 35559 000038F1 E8DD0B                          call    print
 35560                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 35561 000038F4 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 35562 000038F9 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 35563                                  kbd_notf5:
 35564                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 35565 000038FB 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 35566 000038FE 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 35567                                  
 35568 00003900 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35569 00003903 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 35570                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 35571 00003905 BA[D54B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 35572 00003908 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 35573 0000390B B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 35574 0000390D 881E[0347]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 35575                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 35576 00003911 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 35577 00003913 CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 35578 00003915 C606[0947]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 35579 0000391A 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 35580 0000391C 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 35581                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 35582 0000391E 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 35583 00003921 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 35584                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 35585 00003923 E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 35586 00003926 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 35587 00003927 C3                              retn			;
 35588                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 35589 00003928 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 35590 00003929 C3                              retn			;
 35591                                  
 35592                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35593                                  ;
 35594                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 35595                                  ;
 35596                                  ;   INPUT
 35597                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 35598                                  ;
 35599                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35600                                  ;       None
 35601                                  ;
 35602                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35603                                  ;       None
 35604                                  ;
 35605                                  ;   HISTORY
 35606                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35607                                  ;
 35608                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35609                                  
 35610                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 35611                                  
 35612                                  set_numlock:
 35613                                          ; 04/01/2023
 35614                                  	;push	ax
 35615 0000392A 1E                              push    ds
 35616 0000392B 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 35617 0000392D 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 35618 0000392F 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 35619 00003932 2E3B06[724B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 35620 00003937 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 35621 00003939 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 35622 0000393E EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 35623                                  not_off:
 35624 00003940 2E3B06[704B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 35625 00003945 F9                              stc
 35626 00003946 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 35627 00003948 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 35628                                  set_done:
 35629 0000394D 1F                              pop     ds
 35630                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35631                                  	;pop	ax
 35632 0000394E C3                              retn
 35633                                  
 35634                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35635                                  
 35636                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35637                                  ;
 35638                                  ;   menu_check: check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 35639                                  ;
 35640                                  ;   INPUT
 35641                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 35642                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 35643                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35644                                  ;
 35645                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35646                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 35647                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 35648                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 35649                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 35650                                  ;
 35651                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35652                                  ;       All
 35653                                  ;
 35654                                  ;   NOTES
 35655                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 35656                                  ;
 35657                                  ;   HISTORY
 35658                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35659                                  ;
 35660                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35661                                  
 35662                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35663                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 35664                                  
 35665                                  menu_check:
 35666                                  
 35667                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 35668                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 35669
