 36717 00003E24 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36718 00003E26 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 36719 00003E28 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 36720 00003E2B B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 36721 00003E2D CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 36722 00003E2F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36723 00003E31 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 36724 00003E33 8A26[FA46]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 36725 00003E37 3A1E[0447]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 36726 00003E3B 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 36727 00003E3D 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 36728 00003E40 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 36729 00003E42 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 36730 00003E44 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 36731 00003E46 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 36732 00003E48 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 36733 00003E4A 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36734                                  print_other:                    ;
 36735 00003E4D B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 36736 00003E4F 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36737 00003E51 8BBF[2847]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 36738 00003E55 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 36739 00003E57 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 36740 00003E5B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 36741 00003E5D B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 36742 00003E60 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36743 00003E62 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36744 00003E64 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36745 00003E66 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36746                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 36747 00003E68 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 36748 00003E6B CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 36749 00003E6D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36750 00003E6F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36751 00003E71 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36752                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 36753 00003E73 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 36754 00003E76 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 36755 00003E78 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36756 00003E7A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36757 00003E7C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36758 00003E7E 06                              push    es              ;
 36759                                  print_loop:                     ;
 36760 00003E7F 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 36761 00003E82 47                              inc     di              ;
 36762 00003E83 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 36763 00003E85 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 36764 00003E87 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 36765                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 36766 00003E89 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 36767 00003E8B 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 36768 00003E8D 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 36769 00003E8F 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 36770 00003E91 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 36771 00003E93 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36772 00003E95 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36773 00003E97 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 36774 00003E9A 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 36775 00003E9C B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36776 00003E9E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36777 00003EA0 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 36778                                  print_done:                     ;
 36779 00003EA2 07                              pop     es              ;
 36780 00003EA3 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 36781 00003EA4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36782 00003EA6 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 36783 00003EA8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36784 00003EA9 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 36785 00003EAA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36786 00003EAB 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36787 00003EAC 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36788 00003EAD C3                              retn			;
 36789                                  
 36790                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36791                                  ;
 36792                                  ;   select_item: wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 36793                                  ;
 36794                                  ;   INPUT
 36795                                  ;       None
 36796                                  ;
 36797                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36798                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 36799                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 36800                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 36801                                  ;
 36802                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36803                                  ;       None
 36804                                  ;
 36805                                  ;   NOTES
 36806                                  ;       None
 36807                                  ;
 36808                                  ;   HISTORY
 36809                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36810                                  ;
 36811                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36812                                  
 36813                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 36814 00003EAE 8A1E[0447]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 36815 00003EB2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36816 00003EB4 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 36817 00003EB7 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 36818 00003EBA 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36819 00003EBF 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 36820 00003EC1 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 36821 00003EC3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 36822 00003EC5 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 36823                                  check_time:
 36824 00003EC7 A0[0847]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 36825 00003ECA 2A06[0947]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 36826 00003ECE 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 36827 00003ED0 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; disable all further prompting
 36828 00003ED5 C606[0947]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 36829 00003EDA E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 36830                                  show_time:
 36831 00003EDD 53                              push    bx              ;
 36832 00003EDE 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 36833 00003EE0 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36834 00003EE4 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36835 00003EE6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36836 00003EE8 52                              push    dx              ;
 36837 00003EE9 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 36838 00003EEC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36839 00003EEE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36840 00003EF0 BA[C04C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 36841 00003EF3 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 36842 00003EF6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 36843 00003EF8 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 36844 00003EF9 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 36845 00003EFB F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 36846 00003EFD 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 36847 00003EFF 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 36848 00003F01 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36849 00003F03 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 36850 00003F05 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 36851 00003F07 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 36852 00003F09 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36853 00003F0B CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 36854 00003F0D 5A                              pop     dx
 36855 00003F0E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 36856 00003F10 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36857 00003F12 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36858                                  input_key:
 36859 00003F13 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 36860 00003F15 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 36861 00003F17 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 36862 00003F19 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 36863 00003F1B 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 36864 00003F20 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 36865 00003F22 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 36866 00003F24 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 36867 00003F26 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 36868 00003F28 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 36869 00003F2A 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 36870 00003F2C 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 36871 00003F2E B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 36872                                  got_time:
 36873 00003F30 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 36874 00003F32 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 36875 00003F34 0036[0947]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 36876 00003F38 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 36877                                  got_key:
 36878 00003F3A 50                              push    ax              ;
 36879 00003F3B B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 36880 00003F3E 8706[0847]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 36881 00003F42 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 36882 00003F44 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 36883 00003F46 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 36884 00003F47 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36885 00003F4A 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36886 00003F4E B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 36887 00003F51 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 36888 00003F53 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 36889                                  
 36890                                  timeout_disabled:
 36891 00003F54 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36892 00003F55 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 36893 00003F57 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 36894 00003F59 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 36895 00003F5B 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 36896                                  
 36897 00003F5D 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 36898 00003F5F 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 36899 00003F61 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 36900 00003F64 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 36901 00003F66 FE0E[0447]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36902 00003F6A E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36903 00003F6D FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 36904 00003F6F EB12                            jmp     short print1
 36905                                  not_up:
 36906 00003F71 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 36907 00003F73 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 36908 00003F75 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 36909 00003F79 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 36910 00003F7B FE06[0447]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36911 00003F7F E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36912 00003F82 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 36913                                  print1: 
 36914 00003F83 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 36915                                  print2: 
 36916 00003F85 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 36917 00003F88 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 36918                                  to_input_key:
 36919 00003F8B EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 36920                                  not_down:
 36921 00003F8D F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36922 00003F92 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 36923 00003F94 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36924 00003F96 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 36925 00003F98 8036[0347]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36926 00003F9D E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 36927 00003FA0 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 36928                                  not_f8:
 36929 00003FA3 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36930 00003FA5 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 36931                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 36932                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 36933                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 36934 00003FA7 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 36935 00003FAC BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 36936 00003FAF B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 36937 00003FB1 EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 36938                                  
 36939                                  normal_key:
 36940 00003FB3 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 36941 00003FB5 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 36942 00003FB7 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 36943 00003FB9 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 36944 00003FBB BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 36945 00003FBE C3                              retn			;
 36946                                  not_backspace:
 36947 00003FBF 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 36948 00003FC1 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 36949 00003FC3 3A06[0547]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 36950 00003FC7 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 36951 00003FC9 A2[0447]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 36952 00003FCC E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 36953 00003FCF 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 36954 00003FD1 EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 36955                                  
 36956                                  select_done:

 36959 00003FD7 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 36960                                  
 36961                                  	; fall into disp_input

 37039                                  show_status:
 37040 00003FFE 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 37041 00003FFF 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]

 37059                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 37060                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)

 37081                                  ;
 37082                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37083                                  ;
 37084                                  ;   INPUT
 37085                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37086                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37087                                  ;
 37088                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37089                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37090                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37091                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37092                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37093                                  ;
 37094                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37095                                  ;       AX
 37096                                  ;
 37097                                  ;   NOTES
 37098                                  ;       None
 37099                                  ;
 37100                                  ;   HISTORY
 37101                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37102                                  ;
 37103                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37104                                  
 37105                                  skip_token:
 37106 0000403B E84D00                          call    get_char
 37107 0000403E 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37108 00004040 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37109 00004043 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37110                                  skip_check_eol:
 37111 00004045 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37112 00004047 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37113 00004049 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37114 0000404B 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37115 0000404D F8                              clc
 37116                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37117 0000404E C3                      	retn
 37118                                  skip_token_eol:
 37119 0000404F F9                              stc
 37120                                  skip_token_done:
 37121 00004050 C3                              retn
 37122                                  
 37123                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37124                                  ;
 37125                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37126                                  ;
 37127                                  ;   INPUT
 37128                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37129                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37130                                  ;
 37131                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37132                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37133                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37134                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37135                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37136                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37137                                  ;
 37138                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37139                                  ;       AX
 37140                                  ;
 37141                                  ;   NOTES
 37142                                  ;       None
 37143                                  ;
 37144                                  ;   HISTORY
 37145                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37146                                  ;
 37147                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37148                                  
 37149                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37150 00004051 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37151 00004054 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37152 00004057 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37153 00004059 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37154 0000405C 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37155 0000405E EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37156                                  
 37157                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37158                                  ;
 37159                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37160                                  ;
 37161                                  ;   INPUT
 37162                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37163                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37164                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37165                                  ;
 37166                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37167                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37168                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37169                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37170                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37171                                  ;
 37172                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37173                                  ;       AX
 37174                                  ;
 37175                                  ;   NOTES
 37176                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37177                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37178                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37179                                  ;
 37180                                  ;   HISTORY
 37181                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37182                                  ;
 37183                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37184                                  
 37185                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37186                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37187                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37188                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37189                                       
 37190                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37191                                  
 37192                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37193                                  ;
 37194                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37195                                  ;
 37196                                  ;   INPUT
 37197                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37198                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37199                                  ;
 37200                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37201                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37202                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37203                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37204                                  ;
 37205                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37206                                  ;       AX
 37207                                  ;
 37208                                  ;   NOTES
 37209                                  ;       None
 37210                                  ;
 37211                                  ;   HISTORY
 37212                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37213                                  ;
 37214                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37215                                  
 37216                                  skip_line:
 37217 00004060 E82800                          call    get_char
 37218 00004063 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37219                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37220 00004065 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37221 00004067 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37222                                  skip_line_done:
 37223                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37224 00004069 C3                              retn

 37226                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37227                                  ;
 37228                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37229                                  ;
 37230                                  ;   INPUT
 37231                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37232                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37233                                  ;
 37234                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37235                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37236                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37237                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37238                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37239                                  ;
 37240                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37241                                  ;       AX
 37242                                  ;
 37243                                  ;   NOTES
 37244                                  ;       None
 37245                                  ;
 37246                                  ;   HISTORY
 37247                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37248                                  ;
 37249                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37250

 37252                                  
 37253                                  get_number:
 37254 0000406A 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 37255                                  num_loop:
 37256 0000406C E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 37257 0000406F 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 37258 00004071 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 37259 00004073 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 37260 00004075 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 37261 00004077 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 37262 00004079 50                              push    ax              ;
 37263 0000407A B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 37264 0000407D 52                              push    dx              ;
 37265 0000407E F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37266 00004080 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37267 00004081 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37268 00004083 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37269 00004084 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37270 00004086 98                              cbw                     ;
 37271 00004087 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37272 00004089 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 37273                                  
 37274                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37275                                  ;num_done:
 37276                                          ;retn

 37278                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37279                                  ;
 37280                                  ;   get_char: return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37281                                  ;
 37282                                  ;   INPUT
 37283                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37284                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37285                                  ;
 37286                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37287                                  ;       AL == next character
 37288                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37289                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37290                                  ;
 37291                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37292                                  ;       AX
 37293                                  ;
 37294                                  ;   NOTES
 37295                                  ;       None
 37296                                  ;
 37297                                  ;   HISTORY
 37298                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37299                                  ;
 37300                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37301                                  
 37302                                  get_char:
 37303 0000408B 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37304 0000408E 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37305                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37306 00004090 26                      	es	
 37307 00004091 AC                      	lodsb
 37308 00004092 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37309 00004094 C3                              retn			;
 37310                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37311 00004095 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37312                                  nearby_ret:
 37313 00004098 C3                              retn

 37315                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37316                                  ;
 37317                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37318                                  ;
 37319                                  ;   INPUT
 37320                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37321                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37322                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 37323                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 37324                                  ;
 37325                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37326                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 37327                                  ;
 37328                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37329                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 37330                                  ;
 37331                                  ;   NOTES
 37332                                  ;       None
 37333                                  ;
 37334                                  ;   HISTORY
 37335                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37336                                  ;
 37337                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37338                                  
 37339                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37340                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 37341                                  
 37342                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37343                                  query_user:
 37344 00004099 F606[0347]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 37345                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37346 0000409E 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 37347 000040A0 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 37348                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37349                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 37350                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 37351                                  qu_1:
 37352 000040A3 F606[0347]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 37353 000040A8 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 37354 000040AA 50                              push    ax                      ;
 37355 000040AB A0[B814]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 37356 000040AE F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 37357 000040B3 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 37358 000040B5 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 37359                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37360 000040B7 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 37361                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37362                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 37363                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 37364                                  
 37365                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37366 000040B9 58                      	pop	ax
 37367 000040BA C3                      	retn
 37368                                  
 37369                                  query_all:
 37370                                  
 37371                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 37372                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 37373                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 37374                                  
 37375 000040BB 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37376 000040BC BA[124D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 37377 000040BF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37378 000040C1 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 37379                                  
 37380 000040C3 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 37381 000040C5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 37382 000040C7 BF[5047]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 37383                                  find_match:                             ;
 37384 000040CA 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 37385 000040CC 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 37386 000040CE 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 37387 000040D0 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37388 000040D1 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 37389 000040D3 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 37390 000040D5 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 37391                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 37392 000040D8 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 37393                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 37394 000040DA 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 37395 000040DD B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 37396 000040DF B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37397                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 37398 000040E1 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 37399 000040E3 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37400 000040E4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37401 000040E6 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37402 000040E8 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 37403 000040EA B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 37404 000040EC 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 37405 000040EF 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 37406 000040F1 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 37407                                  cmd_notset:
 37408 000040F3 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 37409                                  line_print:                             ;
 37410                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 37411 000040F5 26                              es
 37412 000040F6 AC                      	lodsb
 37413 000040F7 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 37414 000040F9 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 37415 000040FB B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 37416                                  non_null:                               ;
 37417 000040FD 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 37418 000040FF 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 37419 00004101 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 37420                                          ; 10/09/2023
 37421 00004103 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 37422                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 37423 00004106 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 37424                                  non_space:                              ;
 37425 00004108 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37426 0000410A B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 37427 0000410C CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37428 0000410E EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 37429                                  
 37430                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 37431 00004110 BA[B04C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 37432                                  
 37433                                  generic_prompt:
 37434 00004113 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 37435                                  input_loop:                             ;
 37436 00004116 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 37437 00004118 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 37438 0000411A 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 37439 0000411C 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 37440 0000411E 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 37441 00004121 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 37442 00004123 A0[BC4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO] 		;
 37443 00004126 800E[0347]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 37444 0000412B EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 37445                                  not_func:
 37446 0000412D 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 37447 0000412F 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 37448 00004133 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 37449 00004135 3A06[B84C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 37450 00004139 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 37451 0000413B 803E[B814]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 37452 00004140 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 37453 00004142 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 37454 00004144 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 37455 00004146 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 37456 0000414B A0[B84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 37457                                  legal_char:                             ;
 37458 0000414E E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 37459 00004151 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37460                                  
 37461 00004152 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 37462 00004156 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 37463                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37464 00004158 F8                      	clc
 37465                                  do_cmd:
 37466 00004159 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37467                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37468                                  	; cf=0
 37469                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 37470 0000415A C3                      	retn
 37471                                  
 37472                                  skip_cmd:
 37473 0000415B 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37474                                  skip_all:
 37475 0000415C B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 37476 0000415E F9                      	stc
 37477 0000415F C3                      	retn

 37903                                  ;
 37904                                  ; procedure : getnum
 37905                                  ;
 37906                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 37907                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 37908                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 37909                                  ;
 37910                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37911                                  
 37912                                  getnum:
 37913 000042E2 53                      	push	bx
 37914 000042E3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 37915                                  b2:
 37916 000042E5 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 37917 000042E8 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 37918                                  
 37919 000042EA 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 37920 000042EB 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 37921                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 37922                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37923 000042EC B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 37924 000042EE F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 37925 000042F0 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 37926 000042F1 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 37927 000042F3 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 37928 000042F6 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 37929                                  
 37930 000042F8 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 37931                                  
 37932 000042F9 E830FF                  	call	getchr			; get next digit
 37933 000042FC 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 37934 000042FE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 37935 00004300 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 37936 00004302 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 37937 00004304 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 37938 00004306 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 37939 00004308 7417                    	je	short b15
 37940 0000430A 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 37941 0000430F 7410                    	je	short b15
 37942 00004311 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 37943                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37944                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37945                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 37946                                  	;nop
 37947 00004313 740C                    	je	short b15
 37948 00004315 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 37949 00004317 7408                    	je	short b15
 37950 00004319 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 37951 0000431B 7404                    	je	short b15
 37952 0000431D 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 37953 0000431F 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 37954                                  b15:
 37955 00004321 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 37956 00004326 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 37957                                  b1:
 37958 0000432B 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 37959 0000432D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 37960 0000432F 5B                      	pop	bx
 37961 00004330 C3                      	retn
 37962                                  badnum:
 37963                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37964                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 37965 00004331 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 37966                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 37967 00004333 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 37968 00004337 5B                      	pop	bx
 37969 00004338 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 37970 00004339 C3                      	retn
 37971                                  
 37972                                  ;****************************************************************************
 37973                                  
 37974                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 37975                                  
 37976                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37977                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 37978                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 37979                                  ;	si = 0
 37980                                  ;	ax = country id
 37981                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 37982                                  ;	bx = file handle
 37983                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 37984                                  ;
 37985                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 37986                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 37987                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 37988                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 37989                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37990                                  
 37991                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37992                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 37993                                  
 37994                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37995                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)
 37996                                  
 37997 0000433A 57                      	push	di
 37998 0000433B 50                      	push	ax
 37999 0000433C 52                      	push	dx
 38000                                  
 38001 0000433D 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38002 0000433F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38003 00004341 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 38004 00004344 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 38005 00004347 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38006                                  
 38007 00004349 06                      	push	es
 38008 0000434A 56                      	push	si
 38009                                  
 38010 0000434B 0E                      	push	cs
 38011 0000434C 07                      	pop	es
 38012                                  
 38013 0000434D BF[9E45]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 38014 00004350 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature

 38246                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38247                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 38309                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38310                                  
 38311                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38312                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38313                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38314                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38315                                  ;
 38316                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38317                                  ;	 be moved.
 38318                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38319                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38320                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38321                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38322                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 38323                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 38324                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38325                                  
 38326 0000448A 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 38327 0000448B B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38328 0000448E F9                      	stc
 38329 0000448F CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38330 00004491 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 38331 00004492 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 38332                                  
 38333 00004494 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 38334 00004496 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 38335 00004498 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 38336 0000449A F9                      	stc
 38337 0000449B CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 38338                                  ricb_exit:
 38339 0000449D C3                      	retn

 38343                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 38344                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 38345                                  %if 0
 38346                                  
 38347                                  set_country_path:
 38348                                  
 38349                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38350                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 38351                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 38352                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 38353                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 38354                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 38355                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 38356                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38357                                  
 38358                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38359                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 38360                                  
 38361                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38362                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 38363                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 38364                                  
 38365                                  	push	si
 38366                                  
 38367                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38368                                  	push	es
 38369                                  	pop	ds
 38370                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 38371                                  
 38372                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 38373                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 38374                                  
 38375                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38376                                  	inc	si
 38377                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 38378                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 38379                                  
 38380                                  scp_default_drv:
 38381                                  	mov	ah,19h
 38382                                  	int	21h
 38383                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 38384                                  
 38385                                  scp_setdrv:
 38386                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 38387                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 38388                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38389                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 38390                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 38391                                  
 38392                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 38393                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 38394                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 38395                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38396                                  	jne	short scp_path
 38397                                  
 38398                                  scp_root_dir:
 38399                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 38400                                  scp_path:
 38401                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 38402                                  
 38403                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 38404                                  scpath_exit:
 38405                                  
 38406                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38407                                  	push	es
 38408                                  	pop	ds
 38409                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 38410                                  
 38411                                  	pop	si
 38412                                  	retn
 38413                                  
 38414                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38415                                  
 38416                                  chk_drive_letter:
 38417                                  
 38418                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 38419                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 38420                                  ;carry set if not.
 38421                                  
 38422                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 38423                                  
 38424                                  	push	ax
 38425                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 38426                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 38427                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 38428                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 38429                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 38430                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 38431                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 38432                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 38433                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38434                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 38435                                  
 38436                                  cdletter_no:
 38437                                  	stc
 38438                                  cdletter_exit:
 38439                                  	pop	ax
 38440                                  	retn
 38441                                  
 38442                                  %endif

 38514                                  
 38515                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38516                                  
 38517                                  ;  open device pointed to by dx, al has access code
 38518                                  ;   if unable to open do a device open null device instead
 38519                                  
 38520                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38521                                  	; (SYSINIT:3764h)
 38522                                  open_dev:
 38523 000044D6 E80500                  	call	open_file
 38524 000044D9 7309                    	jnc	short open_dev3
 38525                                  
 38526                                  open_dev1:
 38527 000044DB BA[3F45]                	mov	dx,nuldev
 38528                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38529                                  	;call	open_file
 38530                                  ;of_retn:
 38531                                  	;retn
 38532                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38533                                  	;jmp	short open_file
 38534                                  open_file:
 38535 000044DE B43D                    	mov	ah,OPEN	; 3Dh
 38536 000044E0 F9                      	stc
 38537 000044E1 CD21                    	int	21h
 38538                                  of_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 38539 000044E3 C3                      	retn
 38540                                  
 38541                                  open_dev3:
 38542 000044E4 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; handle from open to bx
 38543                                  	;;xor	ax,ax			; get device info
 38544                                  	;;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 38545                                  	;mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8) ; 13/05/2019
 38546                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38547                                  	;xor	ax,ax
 38548                                  	;mov	ah,44h	; IOCTL
 38549                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38550 000044E6 B80044                  	mov	ax,4400h ; IOCTL<<8 
 38551                                  
 38552 000044E9 CD21                    	int	21h
 38553                                  
 38554 000044EB F6C280                  	test	dl,10000000b ; 80h
 38555 000044EE 75F3                    	jnz	short of_retn
 38556                                  
 38557 000044F0 B43E                    	mov	ah,CLOSE ; 3Eh
 38558 000044F2 CD21                    	int	21h
 38559 000044F4 EBE5                    	jmp	short open_dev1
 38560                                  
 38561                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38562                                  
 38563                                  ; 18/12/2022
 38564                                  %if 0
 38565                                  open_file:
 38566                                  	mov	ah,OPEN	; 3Dh
 38567                                  	stc
 38568                                  	int	21h
 38569                                  	retn
 38570                                  %endif
